original: don las don ni grub phyir ro //üîΩrang gi mthong ba'i khyad par can gyi /üîΩdon smos pa gang yin pa de ni sgra dang rtog pa tsam gyis sbyar ba'i bdag nyid can gtan tshigs ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: don las don ni grub phyir ro // rang gi mthong ba'i khyad par can gyi / don smos pa gang yin pa de ni sgra dang rtog pa tsam gyis sbyar ba'i bdag nyid can gtan tshigs ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the meaning is established from the fact.

original: don gnyis las go bar byed pa nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gnyis las go bar byed pa nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning that is stated as a specific observation is not a logical reason that has the nature of being connected by mere word and thought, because it is possible that the meaning is understood from the fact.

original: gal te ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid dag kho na ma rtogs pa'i don sgrub pa la gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid dag kho na ma rtogs pa'i don sgrub pa la gtan tshigs ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is argued that a meaning that is not established, contradictory, or indefinite is not a logical reason for proving a meaning that is not understood,

original: gal te 'di la tshul gsum yod na ci ltar gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te 'di la tshul gsum yod na ci ltar gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: then if it has the three modes, how could it not be a logical reason?

original: de ste tshul gsum med na de'i tshe rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas bzlog zin pas don smos pas ci bya ste /
analyzed: de ste tshul gsum med na de'i tshe rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas bzlog zin pas don smos pas ci bya ste /
translated: But if it does not have the three modes, then at that time, since it has already been refuted by the definition of an inference for oneself, what is the use of stating the meaning?

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa yin pa'i phyir zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags ston pa yin pa'i phyir zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is not so, because an inference for others is the statement of a reason that has the three modes.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang rtog pas sgro btags pa'i tshul gsum gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid thob pa yin pas /
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang rtog pas sgro btags pa'i tshul gsum gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid thob pa yin pas /
translated: Also, in the case of inference for oneself, the definition of a reason is the trimodal condition that is verbally fabricated by thought.

original: ji ltar de las ldog pa yin 'o na 'dir smos pa de bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar de las ldog pa yin 'o na 'dir smos pa de bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If that is so, then it is not necessary to mention it here,

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is to be made into an inference for oneself.

original: 'di la brjod pa rang gi nges pa bzhin gzhan gyi tshig kyang sgrub par byed par 'dod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa rang gi nges pa bzhin gzhan gyi tshig kyang sgrub par byed par 'dod pa de dag ni /
translated: We respond to that: Those who assert that the words of others are established in the same way that one‚Äôs own convictions are established

original: mi rigs par smra bar bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi rigs par smra bar bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: are shown to be speaking in an unreasonable way.

original: de ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not established.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa sgrub byed yin gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa sgrub byed yin gyi /
translated: A proof is that which establishes the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the probandum itself.

original: tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshig sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that words are the proof,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: tshig ni dngos su sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshig ni dngos su sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Words are not the actual proof

original: bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not related to the probandum.

original: tshig ni don dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig ni don dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: The words are not related to the meaning.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / don gyis don rtogs phyir don la //
analyzed: de'i phyir / don gyis don rtogs phyir don la //
translated: the meaning is understood through the meaning,

original: phyogs dang gtan tshigs brjod nus med //üîΩdes na de dag rang nyid las //
analyzed: phyogs dang gtan tshigs brjod nus med // des na de dag rang nyid las //
translated: so the position and reason cannot be stated.üîΩTherefore, they are not established

original: sgrub par byed pa gnas ma yin //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gnas ma yin //
translated: from themselves.

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes tshul gsum pas byas @139b pa nyid mi rtag pa go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes tshul gsum pas byas @139b pa nyid mi rtag pa go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is produced. The trimodal condition makes one understand that what is produced is impermanent.

original: de de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir phyogs kyi tshig gam gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni ma yin no //üîΩde lta ma yin na sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: de de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir phyogs kyi tshig gam gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni ma yin no // de lta ma yin na sgra rtag ste /
translated: Because there is no error in that, it is not a statement of the position or a statement of the reason.

original: gzhal bya'i phyir zhes bya bas kyang bsgrub bya grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhal bya'i phyir zhes bya bas kyang bsgrub bya grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the statement ‚ÄúSound is permanent because it is perceptible‚Äù would also establish the probandum,

original: de la yang phyogs dang gtan tshigs kyi tshig yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang phyogs dang gtan tshigs kyi tshig yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it also contains the words of the position and the reason.

original: de'i don der ma 'brel pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i don der ma 'brel pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not a reason because its meaning is not related to that,

original: 'o na ni 'brel pa'i phyir don nyid kyis don rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'brel pa'i phyir don nyid kyis don rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: then the meaning itself would understand the meaning because they are related.

original: tshig ni dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig ni dngos su sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The words themselves do not prove anything.

original: tshig ni don med par yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ni don med par yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because words exist even when there is no meaning.

original: gang du gtan tshigs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa der /
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa der /
translated: And where the words of the reason do not prove anything,

original: phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin par ni ma brjod par grub po //
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa ma yin par ni ma brjod par grub po //
translated: the words of the proposition are established as not proving anything.

original: 'on te bsgrub bya'i tshig bsgrub bya'i don sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bsgrub bya'i tshig bsgrub bya'i don sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the words of the proposition prove the meaning of the proposition by way of proving it,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: gtan tshigs don med par thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don med par thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that the reason would be meaningless.

original: 'on te dam bcas pa tsam ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'god do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dam bcas pa tsam ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'god do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that you set forth the reason because the mere thesis does not prove anything,

original: ci ltar sgrub byed ma yin pa sgrub byed yin /
analyzed: ci ltar sgrub byed ma yin pa sgrub byed yin /
translated: then how could what does not prove be a proof?

original: lhan cig pa sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig pa sgrub byed yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the co-present proves,

original: ci ltar mkho ba med pa lhan cig tu byed /
analyzed: ci ltar mkho ba med pa lhan cig tu byed /
translated: then how could what is not needed be co-present?

original: 'ga' yang nye bar mi mkho ba lhan cig tu 'dod pa ni med do /
analyzed: 'ga' yang nye bar mi mkho ba lhan cig tu 'dod pa ni med do /
translated: There is no desire for something that is not needed to be co-present.

original: de'i phyir tshigs ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshigs ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not a proof.

original: gzhan yang / phyogs kyi tshig de smra ba po'i //üîΩbsam pa ston par byed pa las //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phyogs kyi tshig de smra ba po'i // bsam pa ston par byed pa las //
translated: Moreover,üîΩThe statement of the reason is not a proof,

original: tshad yin de las the tshom dag / skye phyir dngos su sgrub byed min //
analyzed: tshad yin de las the tshom dag / skye phyir dngos su sgrub byed min //
translated: because doubt arises from it,üîΩsince it shows the speaker‚Äôs intention.

original: der the tshom gyi rgyu nyid ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: der the tshom gyi rgyu nyid ni gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: The reason is not a cause of doubt.

original: don dang ma 'brel pa nyid kyis the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: don dang ma 'brel pa nyid kyis the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: It is a cause of doubt because it is not related to the meaning.

original: de lta ma yin na gtan tshigs dgod pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gtan tshigs dgod pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the statement of the reason would be pointless.

original: 'o na ni ci ltar tshig bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa ni don kyang de las rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni ci ltar tshig bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa ni don kyang de las rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But if the reason is not a proof of the meaning to be proven, then the meaning is not understood from it, just as the reason is not a proof of the meaning to be proven.

original: der yang de 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: der yang de 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
translated: In that case, there is no relation between them.

original: 'brel pa yin na ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'brel pa yang gang gis zlog par byed ce na /
analyzed: 'brel pa yin na ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'brel pa yang gang gis zlog par byed ce na /
translated: If there is a relation, then what is the relation between the reason and the meaning to be proven?

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i don kyang tshig gis sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i don kyang tshig gis sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do /
translated: The meaning of the proof is not established by the words.

original: der bsam pa ston pa las tshad ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: der bsam pa ston pa las tshad ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the meaning is taught there, it is valid cognition.

original: des na dngos su ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //üîΩgrub par byed pa la yang tshig gi tshad ma nyid 'phen pa yin no //üîΩbsgrub bya la yang tshad ma 'phen par 'gyur @140a * //
analyzed: des na dngos su ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no // grub par byed pa la yang tshig gi tshad ma nyid 'phen pa yin no // bsgrub bya la yang tshad ma 'phen par 'gyur @140a * //
translated: Therefore, it is not directly a proof.üîΩAnd in the case of establishing, it is the valid cognition of words that is implied.

original: ro zhe na /
analyzed: ro zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that valid cognition would be implied in the probandum,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: der ni de nyid kyi tshe tshad mar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der ni de nyid kyi tshe tshad mar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there, at that time, it would be valid cognition.

original: tshig gis ni sngon zhugs pa'i tshad ma 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig gis ni sngon zhugs pa'i tshad ma 'phen pa yin te /
translated: Words imply previously engaged valid cognition,

original: de la brjed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brjed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because forgetting that is possible.

original: da ltar ba la ni mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin pas /
analyzed: da ltar ba la ni mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin pas /
translated: In the present, it is direct perception itself that is valid cognition,

original: de la tshig gis ci bya /
analyzed: de la tshig gis ci bya /
translated: so what would words do there?

original: mngon sum gyi don la ni gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi don la ni gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa chen po ma yin no //
translated: In the meaning of direct perception, there is no great need for others' teachings.

original: de'i phyir tshigs ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshigs ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, words are not a proof.

original: 'o na phyogs kyi tshig brgyud nas sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na phyogs kyi tshig brgyud nas sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: But if you say that the reason is established by implication through the words of the thesis,

original: dper na sgrub par byed pa'i tshig bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na sgrub par byed pa'i tshig bzhin no zhe na /
translated: then it would be like the words of the proof.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is also not so.

original: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis //
translated: Because the thesis is stated,

original: brgyud pa yis kyang nus pa med //üîΩgtan tshigs brjod pa rang nyid la //
analyzed: brgyud pa yis kyang nus pa med // gtan tshigs brjod pa rang nyid la //
translated: the reason is not able to establish it even by implication.üîΩEven though the statement of the reason is not able to establish the thesis,

original: nus pa med kyang nus ston byed //
analyzed: nus pa med kyang nus ston byed //
translated: it shows the ability to establish it.

original: gal te tshad mas grub pa'i nus pa ston par byed pa yin na ni ci ltar sgrub par byed pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas grub pa'i nus pa ston par byed pa yin na ni ci ltar sgrub par byed pa'i tshig sgrub par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: If it shows the ability to establish the thesis that is established by valid cognition, then just as the words of the proof establish the thesis,

original: phyogs kyi tshig kyang 'gyur ba yin na ni /
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig kyang 'gyur ba yin na ni /
translated: the words of the thesis would also be the same.

original: ma grub par ston pa na ci ltar grung par byed pa yin /
analyzed: ma grub par ston pa na ci ltar grung par byed pa yin /
translated: But if it shows the thesis to be unestablished, how could it establish it?

original: rang nyid mi nus pa ni nus pa la ma brten par nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid mi nus pa ni nus pa la ma brten par nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is itself unable to establish the thesis does not become able to establish it without depending on the ability to establish it.

original: 'di ltar / 'gyel ba 'gyel ba la brten nas //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'gyel ba 'gyel ba la brten nas //
translated: Thus:

original: gang du 'ang brten par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: gang du 'ang brten par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: A fallen person does not stand by depending on a fallen person.

original: de bzhin ma grub ma grub pa //
analyzed: de bzhin ma grub ma grub pa //
translated: In the same way, an unestablished reasonüîΩdoes not establish the thesis.

original: de nyid kyis ni rab grub min //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni rab grub min //
translated: Therefore, it is not established by that.

original: phyogs kyi tshig gis ni bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir ci ltar phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshig gis ni bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir ci ltar phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa yin /
translated: In response to the question, ‚ÄúHow is the statement of the reason a proof?‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni rang nyid nus pa med kyang nus pa rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi tshig ni rang nyid nus pa med kyang nus pa rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The statement of the reason is said to be a proof because, although it is itself powerless, it expresses power.

original: sgrub par byed pa brjod do //üîΩbsgrub bya'i don dang 'brel pa yis //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa brjod do // bsgrub bya'i don dang 'brel pa yis //
translated: It is said to be a proof because it expresses the probandum.üîΩThe statement of the reason is said to be a proof

original: sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: because it expresses the probandum in connection with it.

original: tshig ni sgrub byed yin brjod de //
analyzed: tshig ni sgrub byed yin brjod de //
translated: The statement of the reason is said to be a proofüîΩbecause it expresses the probandum in connection with it,

original: de rang nyid ni sgrub byed min //
analyzed: de rang nyid ni sgrub byed min //
translated: but it itself is not a proof.

original: des ni gzhan gyi don dang rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: des ni gzhan gyi don dang rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is contradictory to say that it is for the sake of others and it is inference.

original: 'di ltar / bstan par bya ba la ltos nas ni rang don nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar / bstan par bya ba la ltos nas ni rang don nyid yin la /
translated: In this way, it is for one‚Äôs own sake in dependence on the object to be indicated,

original: ston par byed pa la ltos nas ni rjes su brjod pa tsam du zad do zhes gang brjod pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: ston par byed pa la ltos nas ni rjes su brjod pa tsam du zad do zhes gang brjod pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
translated: but in dependence on the one who indicates it, it is merely a repetition.

original: de ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis nye bar brtags nas rjes su dpag par brjod kyi /
analyzed: de ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis nye bar brtags nas rjes su dpag par brjod kyi /
translated: It is said to be inferred by implication because it is the cause of inference.

original: rang nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not itself an inference.

original: des na bstan par bya ba la ltos nas ni /
analyzed: des na bstan par bya ba la ltos nas ni /
translated: Therefore, with respect to what is to be taught,

original: de rang gi don nyid do zhes bya ba ni gyi na brjod pa nyid de /
analyzed: de rang gi don nyid do zhes bya ba ni gyi na brjod pa nyid de /
translated: it is said that it is for one‚Äôs own sake.

original: de la ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags nyid rtogs pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi don yin gyi /
analyzed: de la ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags nyid rtogs pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi don yin gyi /
translated: In that case, the sign that has the three modes is for one‚Äôs own sake because it causes one to understand.

original: @140b tshig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: @140b tshig ni ma yin te /
translated: But the words are not,

original: de las don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not understand the meaning from them.

original: dran par byed pas de yang phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir byed pa brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dran par byed pas de yang phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir byed pa brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: Since they remind one of the sign that has the three modes, they are also helpful.

original: tshig ni sgrub byed yin brjod su brjod pa tsam zhig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ni sgrub byed yin brjod su brjod pa tsam zhig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore the words are said to be for the sake of the other because they are stated for the sake of expressing the sign that has the three modes.

original: des na tshig ni gnyis ka la ltos kyang rjes su brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na tshig ni gnyis ka la ltos kyang rjes su brjod pa nyid do //
translated: Thus the words are stated for the sake of both, but they are stated for the sake of the other by implication.

original: de'i gzhan gyi don nyid ni ston par byed pa la ltos nas yin te /
analyzed: de'i gzhan gyi don nyid ni ston par byed pa la ltos nas yin te /
translated: Its being for the sake of the other is with respect to teaching.

original: ston par byed pa la ni des cis kyang phan btags pa med do //
analyzed: ston par byed pa la ni des cis kyang phan btags pa med do //
translated: But the teacher does not help the object taught in any way.

original: de'i rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis rjes su dpag pa nyid ni bstan par bya ba la ltos pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis rjes su dpag pa nyid ni bstan par bya ba la ltos pa nyid do //
translated: Inference is dependent on the object taught, because it is the cause of inference.

original: gal te gzhan la ltos nas ni rjes su dpag pa nyid yin par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: gal te gzhan la ltos nas ni rjes su dpag pa nyid yin par 'gyur bas /
translated: If it were dependent on another, it would be inference.

original: 'di ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: yon tan nyid la skyon du sgro 'dogs pa 'am /
analyzed: yon tan nyid la skyon du sgro 'dogs pa 'am /
translated: It is a case of superimposing a fault on a virtue.

original: gang gi phyir ston par byed pa de la de rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur gyi /üîΩbstan par bya ba nyid la yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ston par byed pa de la de rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur gyi / bstan par bya ba nyid la yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the teacher does not infer that object,üîΩbut the object taught itself does.

original: de ston par byed pa las gzhan gyi don yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa las gzhan gyi don yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the teacher's statement is for the sake of others, not for his own sake.

original: de lta ma yin na ni rang gi don du yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni rang gi don du yang 'gyur te /
translated: If it were not so, it would be for his own sake,

original: des rang nyid de'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des rang nyid de'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he would be acting for his own sake.

original: nye bar brtags pa'i dgos pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: nye bar brtags pa'i dgos pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: The purpose of the investigation has also been explained.

original: tshig ni rnam pa gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ni rnam pa gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a statement does not accomplish the purpose of another.

original: gal te dran pa la yang tshig tshad ma 'am tshad ma ma yin /
analyzed: gal te dran pa la yang tshig tshad ma 'am tshad ma ma yin /
translated: If memory is a valid cognition, is it a valid cognition or not?

original: tshad ma yin no zhen ci ste don la ma yin /
analyzed: tshad ma yin no zhen ci ste don la ma yin /
translated: If it is a valid cognition, why is it not a valid cognition with regard to its object?

original: tshad ma ma yin na ci ltar de las dran pa skye zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin na ci ltar de las dran pa skye zhe na /
translated: If it is not a valid cognition, how can memory arise from it?

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because of that.

original: de lta ma yin na de las tshad ma nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de las tshad ma nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were not so, it would be a valid cognition,

original: dran pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not memory.

original: dran pa la de rgyu yin gyi shes par byed pa ma yin pas na /
analyzed: dran pa la de rgyu yin gyi shes par byed pa ma yin pas na /
translated: Memory is its cause, but it is not a means of knowing.

original: tshad ma nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a valid cognition.

original: don dang 'brel pa me dpa'i phyir de las dran pa nyid ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: don dang 'brel pa me dpa'i phyir de las dran pa nyid ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can memory arise from it, since it is not related to the object?

original: du ba ni me dang 'brel pa'i phyir dran pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba ni me dang 'brel pa'i phyir dran pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: Smoke produces memory because it is related to fire.

original: der bzhin du gal te de dang sgra yang 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: der bzhin du gal te de dang sgra yang 'brel pa yin na /
translated: In the same way, if sound were related to that,

original: de ltar dran pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would produce memory.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / dran pa gang dang gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dran pa gang dang gang yin pa //
translated: Any memory

original: de ni 'brel pa las yod yin //
analyzed: de ni 'brel pa las yod yin //
translated: exists due to a relation.

original: de ltar lkog gyur me la ni //
analyzed: de ltar lkog gyur me la ni //
translated: In that way,

original: du ba la ni dran pa yin ;
analyzed: du ba la ni dran pa yin ;
translated: But memory is of smoke.

original: / de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: dran pa tsam 'brel pa las yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dran pa tsam 'brel pa las yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because memory is of mere connection.

original: 'brel pa dang dran par byed par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa dang dran par byed par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not of the connection and the memory.

original: don dang ma 'brel pa las kyang yin pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la 'gal ba ci yod 'di ltar mthong ba'i don la 'bad rtsol lam /üîΩmang du lhan cig spyod pa yi //üîΩgang rung don @141a * //üîΩ'ga' zhig las kyang //
analyzed: don dang ma 'brel pa las kyang yin pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la 'gal ba ci yod 'di ltar mthong ba'i don la 'bad rtsol lam / mang du lhan cig spyod pa yi // gang rung don @141a * // 'ga' zhig las kyang //
translated: Because it is also of something not connected. What contradiction is there in these two?

original: dran pa skye ba min nas ci //
analyzed: dran pa skye ba min nas ci //
translated: Because memory arises from someüîΩobject,üîΩwhether it is seen or not,üîΩwhether it is seen many times or not,üîΩwhether it is seen with effort or not.

original: 'on te nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi dran pa ni 'brel pa nyid las yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi dran pa ni 'brel pa nyid las yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that memory is of a definite nature, it is from connection, not from anything else.

original: de ni rigs te /
analyzed: de ni rigs te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'brel pa med par ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa med par ni /
translated: Because without a connection,

original: de der nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de der nges pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not definite that it is that.

original: 'on kyang sgra las ni nges pa'i rang bzhin du dran no zhes ma grub pa des na 'brel par mi 'grub po //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra las ni nges pa'i rang bzhin du dran no zhes ma grub pa des na 'brel par mi 'grub po //
translated: But it is not established that memory is of a definite nature from sound. Therefore, the connection is not established.

original: 'di ltar 'brel pa ma brtags pa dag ni the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'brel pa ma brtags pa dag ni the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Because without examining the connection, there is doubt.

original: sgra las ni the tshom skye bar dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: sgra las ni the tshom skye bar dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: But from the words, doubt arises.

original: 'on ci ltar nges smras pa de ni de kho na ltar yin no zhes bya bar nges she na /
analyzed: 'on ci ltar nges smras pa de ni de kho na ltar yin no zhes bya bar nges she na /
translated: But how can one be certain that it is just as he says?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, one cannot be certain.

original: nges pa de ni tshad ma nyid las yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa de ni tshad ma nyid las yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because certainty comes from a valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar sngar zhugs pa tshad mas brtags pa nyid las nges pa yin gyi tshig tsam gyis ni ma yin no //üîΩ'o na tshad ma'i nges pa'i tshig las yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngar zhugs pa tshad mas brtags pa nyid las nges pa yin gyi tshig tsam gyis ni ma yin no // 'o na tshad ma'i nges pa'i tshig las yin la /
translated: For certainty comes from the examination of the object by a valid cognition, not from mere words.üîΩBut the definition of valid cognition is from the words.

original: de lta na yang tshig tshad ma nyid do zhe na 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: de lta na yang tshig tshad ma nyid do zhe na 'di la brjod pa /
translated: And if that is so, then the words are valid cognition.üîΩThe answer to that is:

original: de ltar 'di la 'dod pa nyid //
analyzed: de ltar 'di la 'dod pa nyid //
translated: Here, it is just a matter of opinion.

original: rang nyid don la de tshad min //
analyzed: rang nyid don la de tshad min //
translated: The words themselves are not valid cognitions of the object.

original: gang phyir don 'di grub pa na //
analyzed: gang phyir don 'di grub pa na //
translated: Because the object is already established,

original: nged la tshad ma ci yang med //
analyzed: nged la tshad ma ci yang med //
translated: we have no need for valid cognition.

original: don la mi tshig tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: don la mi tshig tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Words are not valid cognitions of the object.

original: tshad ma tshad ma zhes byas pas ni chad pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: tshad ma tshad ma zhes byas pas ni chad pa ci yang med do //
translated: But there is no harm in calling valid cognition ‚Äúvalid cognition.‚Äù

original: tshad ma yang tshig las ni grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma yang tshig las ni grub pa ma yin te /
translated: And valid cognition is not established from the words.

original: de ni rang rig pas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang rig pas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established by reflexive awareness.

original: de la ni dran par byed pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: de la ni dran par byed pa tsam yin te /
translated: In that case, it is merely a recollection,

original: des pa ni rang rig pa de kho na las yin no //
analyzed: des pa ni rang rig pa de kho na las yin no //
translated: but the certainty is from that reflexive awareness itself.

original: ci tshig med par yang yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: ci tshig med par yang yin na ma zhe na /
translated: But is it not also the case that there is no statement?

original: yin pa nyid de 'bad rtsol las kyang dran pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin pa nyid de 'bad rtsol las kyang dran pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the case, because recollection is seen to arise from effort.

original: 'on te gang gi tshe 'bad rtsol las ma yin pa de'i tshe ni tshig tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gang gi tshe 'bad rtsol las ma yin pa de'i tshe ni tshig tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But when it does not arise from effort, then the statement is valid.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / tshig las don la log par ni //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / tshig las don la log par ni //
translated: That is not so.üîΩBecause in this way:

original: dran pa'ang skye bar mthong ba yin //üîΩbden dang mi bden pa dag gis //
analyzed: dran pa'ang skye bar mthong ba yin // bden dang mi bden pa dag gis //
translated: Recollection that is mistaken with regard to the meaning is seen to arise from a statement.

original: tshig las khyad par mthong ba med //üîΩdon la rtog na de yi tshe //
analyzed: tshig las khyad par mthong ba med // don la rtog na de yi tshe //
translated: There is no difference seen between true and false statements.

original: de ni rang nyid rjes dpag nyid //
analyzed: de ni rang nyid rjes dpag nyid //
translated: When one analyzes the meaning, then that is inference itself.

original: dran pa log par 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: dran pa log par 'jug pa ni //
translated: Recollection that engages mistakenly

original: 'bad rtsol las kyang skye ba yin //
analyzed: 'bad rtsol las kyang skye ba yin //
translated: arises from effort as well.

original: de yi phyir rtags 'ga' zhig la //
analyzed: de yi phyir rtags 'ga' zhig la //
translated: Therefore, in some cases,

original: shin tu dpyad pa nyid las sngar tshad ma'i rang bzhin nges pa yin te ;
analyzed: shin tu dpyad pa nyid las sngar tshad ma'i rang bzhin nges pa yin te ;
translated: The nature of valid cognition was ascertained earlier through thorough analysis.

original: des na tshig ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tshig ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, words are not valid cognition.

original: tshad ma la ma yin /
analyzed: tshad ma la ma yin /
translated: They are not valid with respect to valid cognition,

original: don la yang ma yin /
analyzed: don la yang ma yin /
translated: nor with respect to the object,

original: 'bad rtsol la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bad rtsol la yang ma yin no //
translated: nor with respect to effort.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la ni rjes su dpag pa nyid tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la ni rjes su dpag pa nyid tshad ma yin la /
translated: With respect to a hidden object, inference itself is valid cognition,

original: tshig ni de'i sgo nas yin no //
analyzed: tshig ni de'i sgo nas yin no //
translated: and words are through that.

original: gal te 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i tshad ma da ltar 'das pa'i phyir ci ltar 'brel pa des @141b da lta ni dran pa yod pa yin na de ni tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i tshad ma da ltar 'das pa'i phyir ci ltar 'brel pa des @141b da lta ni dran pa yod pa yin na de ni tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúSince the valid cognition that apprehends the relation is now past, how can the relation now be remembered through that? If it exists, it is not valid cognition,‚Äù

original: tshad ma des bskyed pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: tshad ma des bskyed pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do //
translated: it is valid cognition because it is produced by valid cognition.üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: des na / tshad ma las skyes dran pa ni //
analyzed: des na / tshad ma las skyes dran pa ni //
translated: ‚ÄúHow can memory produced by valid cognition

original: btags nas tshad ma ji ltar min //
analyzed: btags nas tshad ma ji ltar min //
translated: not be valid cognition when designated as such?

original: tshad ma min las skyes pa gang //
analyzed: tshad ma min las skyes pa gang //
translated: Whatever is produced by non-valid cognition

original: de ni tshad ma min par 'dod //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma min par 'dod //
translated: is asserted to be non-valid cognition.‚Äù

original: dran pa 'di ni tshad ma las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang dran pa nyid rgyu mtshan ma yin nam /
analyzed: dran pa 'di ni tshad ma las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang dran pa nyid rgyu mtshan ma yin nam /
translated: This memory arises from a valid cognition. But is it not the memory itself that is the reason?

original: dran pa de yang dran pa gzhan las yongs su dag pa la brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir nges pa skyes par gal 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa de yang dran pa gzhan las yongs su dag pa la brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir nges pa skyes par gal 'gyur /
translated: And since that memory is based on another memory, and so on, how can certainty arise?

original: dran 'di brtan pa yin zhe na //
analyzed: dran 'di brtan pa yin zhe na //
translated: If you say that this memory is stable,

original: log la brten pa med dam ci //
analyzed: log la brten pa med dam ci //
translated: is it not based on what is false?

original: don thob phyir na log min na //
analyzed: don thob phyir na log min na //
translated: If it is not false because it leads to the attainment of the object,

original: de ni grub pa nyer gzhag nyid //
analyzed: de ni grub pa nyer gzhag nyid //
translated: then it is already established.

original: 'di la yang brjod de /
analyzed: 'di la yang brjod de /
translated: Here we say:

original: 'di ni rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs //
analyzed: 'di ni rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs //
translated: It is known from itself.

original: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
translated: Validity is from convention.

original: ces dang po nyid du bshad zin to //
analyzed: ces dang po nyid du bshad zin to //
translated: This was explained at the beginning.

original: tha snyad kyang don thob pa'i mtshan nyid du dmigs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad kyang don thob pa'i mtshan nyid du dmigs pa nyid yin te /
translated: And convention is observed to have the characteristic of leading to the attainment of the object,

original: gzhan ni mkho ba dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni mkho ba dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: but not to anything else.

original: gal te dran pa 'ga' zhig rang nyid las brtan pa yin pa nges na 'di tshad ma la sogs par nges pa yin gyi tha snyad las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dran pa 'ga' zhig rang nyid las brtan pa yin pa nges na 'di tshad ma la sogs par nges pa yin gyi tha snyad las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is ascertained that some memory is more stable than others, then this is ascertained by valid cognition, not by conventional expressions.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / brtan nyid de ni thob ba las //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / brtan nyid de ni thob ba las //
translated: Because:üîΩStability is due to attainment,

original: brten nas goms pa nyid las yin //üîΩgzhan goms pa las gzhan du ni //
analyzed: brten nas goms pa nyid las yin // gzhan goms pa las gzhan du ni //
translated: and due to repeated practice.üîΩStability does not arise in another

original: brtan pa nye bar skye ma yin //
analyzed: brtan pa nye bar skye ma yin //
translated: due to the repeated practice of another.

original: gal te don thob pa'i mtshan nyid tha snyad goms pa nyid med na ni /
analyzed: gal te don thob pa'i mtshan nyid tha snyad goms pa nyid med na ni /
translated: If there were no repeated practice of conventional expressions that is the characteristic of attaining the object,

original: de ci ltar thob pa la nye bar mkho ba'i brtan par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ci ltar thob pa la nye bar mkho ba'i brtan par 'gyur /
translated: how could it be stable in relation to that which is attained?

original: gzhan goms pas gzhan du brtan par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gzhan goms pas gzhan du brtan par 'gyur na ni /
translated: If stability in one thing were due to the repeated practice of another,

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad de nyid tshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad de nyid tshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then that conventional expression of the world would be valid.

original: de'i phyir 'khor ba pa rnams kyi tshul ni 'di tsam du zad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor ba pa rnams kyi tshul ni 'di tsam du zad pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the method of those in cyclic existence is just this,

original: kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas skyon med do ;
analyzed: kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas skyon med do ;
translated: there is no fault, since a valid cognition that is a conventional expression does not engage.

original: / de'i phyir tshig rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pas /
analyzed: / de'i phyir tshig rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pas /
translated: Therefore, since it is the cause of inferring the meaning,

original: rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //üîΩgal te slob dpon phyogs kyi tshig bzhed pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no // gal te slob dpon phyogs kyi tshig bzhed pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: It is a case of inference.

original: ji skad du /üîΩrang nyid nges bzhin gzhan dag la //
analyzed: ji skad du / rang nyid nges bzhin gzhan dag la //
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that the master [DignƒÅga] himself accepts that [the thesis] is not stated?üîΩ[He says in the Compendium of Valid Cognition:]üîΩOne who, having ascertained [the thesis] himself,

original: nges pa skyed par 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: nges pa skyed par 'dod pa yi //
translated: wishes to generate ascertainment in others,üîΩshould state the property of the position, the relation, and the probandum,

original: phyogs chos 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag / brjod pa las gzhan spang bar bya //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs chos 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag / brjod pa las gzhan spang bar bya // zhes gsungs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and nothing else.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / gtan tshigs don gyi yul nyid kyis //üîΩnus med de ni brjod par bshad //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / gtan tshigs don gyi yul nyid kyis // nus med de ni brjod par bshad //
translated: That is not so.

original: ji skad du /üîΩrjes dpag bya der bstan pa ni //
analyzed: ji skad du / rjes dpag bya der bstan pa ni //
translated: [DignƒÅga] says:

original: gtan tshigs don gyi yul du 'dod //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don gyi yul du 'dod //
translated: Because the object of the reason is the thesis,

original: ces gsungs so// @142a * //üîΩnged kyi ltar na ni rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs kyi don gyi yul nyid du yin gyi /
analyzed: ces gsungs so// @142a * // nged kyi ltar na ni rjes su dpag par bya ba bstan pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs kyi don gyi yul nyid du yin gyi /
translated: it is said that it is not stated.üîΩ[He says in the Compendium of Valid Cognition:]üîΩThe thesis is taught in the statement of the inference;üîΩit is asserted to be the object of the reason.

original: sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: According to us, the thesis is the object of the reason, but it is not the probandum.

original: des na dngos su sgrub par byed pa nyid spangs pas bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa de nus pa med par bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na dngos su sgrub par byed pa nyid spangs pas bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa de nus pa med par bstan pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since the actual proof itself is abandoned, the statement of the probandum is shown to be ineffective.

original: 'o na ni ci ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid dang / 'brel pa dang bsgrub bya brjod pa bstan par khas len ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ni ci ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid dang / 'brel pa dang bsgrub bya brjod pa bstan par khas len ce na /
translated: But how can the property of the subject, the relation, and the statement of the probandum be accepted as taught?

original: phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa dang bsgrub par bya ba yang brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel pa dang bsgrub par bya ba yang brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the property of the subject, the relation, and the statement of the probandum is not this.

original: 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag brjod pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa bsgrub bya dag brjod pa ste /
translated: The relation and the probandum are stated.

original: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa'o zhes khyab pa'i nang du 'dus pa nyid du bsgrub bya brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa'o zhes khyab pa'i nang du 'dus pa nyid du bsgrub bya brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent is the statement of the probandum included within the pervasion.

original: dam bcas pa'i rang bzhin du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i rang bzhin du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not of the nature of the thesis.

original: bsgrub bya ni sgrub par byed pa la khyab par byed pa nyid du gdon mi za bar nye bar bstan par bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ni sgrub par byed pa la khyab par byed pa nyid du gdon mi za bar nye bar bstan par bya ba kho na'o //
translated: The probandum must certainly be shown to be the pervader of the proof.

original: des na yan lag gnyis nyid bstan par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na yan lag gnyis nyid bstan par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the two parts are not to be stated.

original: 'brel pas ni tshul gnyis 'phangs pa'i phyir gtan tshigs tshul gsum pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'brel pas ni tshul gnyis 'phangs pa'i phyir gtan tshigs tshul gsum pa nyid do //
translated: Because of the connection, the reason has the three modes, since it implies the two modes.

original: de'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha mar yang bstan par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha mar yang bstan par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent‚Äù is not to be stated at the beginning or at the end,

original: tshul gnyis pa tsam nyid kyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gnyis pa tsam nyid kyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the probandum is established by the two modes alone.

original: gal te de la'ang nus yod de //
analyzed: gal te de la'ang nus yod de //
translated: If you say that it is possible in that case as well,

original: gtan tshigs tshig ni 'jug phyir na //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tshig ni 'jug phyir na //
translated: because the words of the reason are engaged,

original: de ni the tshom gyis shes par ;
analyzed: de ni the tshom gyis shes par ;
translated: then since that is known through doubt,

original: /'dod pas skabs la bsten pa yin //
analyzed: /'dod pas skabs la bsten pa yin //
translated: it is asserted to be based on the context.

original: mi mthun phyogs khas len na yang //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs khas len na yang //
translated: Even if one accepts the discordant side,

original: de mtshungs phyir na thug med 'gyur //
analyzed: de mtshungs phyir na thug med 'gyur //
translated: because it is the same, there would be an infinite regress.

original: ci ste yang gal te phyogs kyi tshig med na gtan tshigs kyi tshig ma dpyad par thob babs pa dang 'dra par 'brel pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jug cing /
analyzed: ci ste yang gal te phyogs kyi tshig med na gtan tshigs kyi tshig ma dpyad par thob babs pa dang 'dra par 'brel pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jug cing /
translated: But if you say that if there is no statement of the position, then like the unanalyzed obtainment of the words of the reason, there would be no connection and they would not be engaged,

original: de las gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de las gtan tshigs kyi tshig 'jug pa'i phyir de yang sgrub par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: and because the words of the reason are engaged from that, then that is also the proof,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: the tshom za ba dang / shes par 'dod pa dang / skabs dang de'i rtogs pa dang / 'dod pa rnams kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur pas dag gi yan lag bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: the tshom za ba dang / shes par 'dod pa dang / skabs dang de'i rtogs pa dang / 'dod pa rnams kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur pas dag gi yan lag bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: and doubt, and desire to know, and occasion, and understanding of that, and desire, are also established as the ten members of a proof.

original: 'di ni 'dir the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir the tshom za ba'o //
translated: This is the doubt here.

original: khyod kyis shes par 'dod pa ni 'di nyid do //
analyzed: khyod kyis shes par 'dod pa ni 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the desire to know of you.

original: khyod kyi skabs ni 'di nyid do //
analyzed: khyod kyi skabs ni 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the occasion of you.

original: 'di ni ngas rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ngas rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is my understanding.üîΩThis is my desire here.

original: 'dir ni nga 'dod pa yin no zhes de ltar aag tshom 'chos shing dag gi yan lag bcur rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni nga 'dod pa yin no zhes de ltar aag tshom 'chos shing dag gi yan lag bcur rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should set forth the ten members of a proof by making a series of statements.

original: de bzhin du mi mthun phyogs khas blangs na yang sgrub par byed @142b pa 'jug pa de'i phyir de dang lhan cig mi mthun pa'i tshig de yang sgrub par byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi mthun phyogs khas blangs na yang sgrub par byed @142b pa 'jug pa de'i phyir de dang lhan cig mi mthun pa'i tshig de yang sgrub par byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, if one accepts the discordant position, then the proof is engaged. Therefore, it follows that the discordant statement together with that is also a proof.

original: ci ste bsgrub bya des bag tsam ni the tshom la sogs pa yang bstan pa med par yang 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ste bsgrub bya des bag tsam ni the tshom la sogs pa yang bstan pa med par yang 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But if the probandum is not taught by that, then it is just a doubt, etc.

original: sgra'i spros pa tsam las nye bar sbyor ba de dag gis don la gnas pa'i don 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra'i spros pa tsam las nye bar sbyor ba de dag gis don la gnas pa'i don 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But the meaning of the words is not established by the mere application of the words.

original: des na the tshom la sogs pa ni dor ba yin te /
analyzed: des na the tshom la sogs pa ni dor ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, doubt and so on are to be rejected,

original: de rjes su brjod pas ni cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de rjes su brjod pas ni cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because nothing is accomplished by their expression.

original: gal te de lta na dam bcas pa'i tshig kyang rgol ba'i rjes su brjod pa tsam yin te de nang gi yan lag nyid ni ma yin no //üîΩnang gi yan lag nus pa ni ;
analyzed: gal te de lta na dam bcas pa'i tshig kyang rgol ba'i rjes su brjod pa tsam yin te de nang gi yan lag nyid ni ma yin no // nang gi yan lag nus pa ni ;
translated: If that is so, then the statement of the proposition is also merely the expression of the opponent‚Äôs position, and it is not an internal part.üîΩThe internal part is

original: / tshul gsum dag la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: / tshul gsum dag la yang dag gnas //
translated: the power of the trimodal evidence.

original: de la dran pa skyed pa ni //
analyzed: de la dran pa skyed pa ni //
translated: The production of memory

original: de nyid tshig la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: de nyid tshig la yang dag gnas //
translated: is based on the words.

original: re zhig rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags nyid las bsgrub par bya ba'i don de rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags nyid las bsgrub par bya ba'i don de rtogs pa yin no //
translated: In an inference for oneself, the object to be established is understood from the trimodal evidence itself.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ni dang po nyid du bsgrub bya snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par ni dang po nyid du bsgrub bya snang ba ma yin no //
translated: In an inference for oneself, the object to be established does not appear at first.

original: de ni ga rtan tshigs las nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni ga rtan tshigs las nges par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It is ascertained from the reason.

original: des na rang nyid nges pa bzhin du dang po bsgrub bya dgos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rang nyid nges pa bzhin du dang po bsgrub bya dgos pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as it is ascertained for oneself, it is not necessary to establish it for the other at the outset.

original: phyis kyang blang bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: phyis kyang blang bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is to be accepted later,

original: phyis kyang blang par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phyis kyang blang par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: it is not to be accepted later,

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: just like an inference for oneself.

original: gang gi tshe pha rol po la yang tshul gsum las rtogs pa skye ba de'i tshe rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa dang khyad par ci yod //
analyzed: gang gi tshe pha rol po la yang tshul gsum las rtogs pa skye ba de'i tshe rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa dang khyad par ci yod //
translated: When the other also generates understanding from the three modes, then what is the difference from an inference for oneself?

original: de'i phyir dam bcas pa dang mjug bsdu bdag ni mi brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bcas pa dang mjug bsdu bdag ni mi brjod pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, I do not state a conclusion or a summary.

original: nye bar gtod pa yang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar gtod pa yang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Also, the application is not to be stated,

original: mthong ba'i nus pa ston pa'i don du gnyer ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i nus pa ston pa'i don du gnyer ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is sought for the purpose of showing the capacity of seeing.

original: de de na yod pa tsam las gzhan pa'i nus pa ni med la /
analyzed: de de na yod pa tsam las gzhan pa'i nus pa ni med la /
translated: The capacity is not anything other than the mere existence of that.

original: sgra la yod pa tsam de ni phyogs kyi chos nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra la yod pa tsam de ni phyogs kyi chos nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
translated: That mere existence in the sound is understood from the property of the subject.

original: ci ste yang dam bcas pa ni lung gtan tshigs ni rjes su dpag pa /
analyzed: ci ste yang dam bcas pa ni lung gtan tshigs ni rjes su dpag pa /
translated: But if you think that the thesis is scripture, the reason is inference,

original: dpe ni mngon sum nye bar gtong ba ni nye bar 'jal ba /üîΩtshad ma thams cad kyi byed pa'i yul rab tu ston pa lhur byed pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: dpe ni mngon sum nye bar gtong ba ni nye bar 'jal ba / tshad ma thams cad kyi byed pa'i yul rab tu ston pa lhur byed pa ni mjug bsdu ba yin no snyam na /
translated: the example is direct perception, the application is analogy,

original: de ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: and the conclusion is the presentation of the domain of activity of all valid cognitions, then that is not so.

original: 'di ltar / gal te rjes dpag las grub na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te rjes dpag las grub na //
translated: If it is established by inference,

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis 'dir ci bya //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis 'dir ci bya //
translated: what would another valid cognition do here?

original: rjes dpag las mi grub ce na //
analyzed: rjes dpag las mi grub ce na //
translated: If it is not established by inference,

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis 'dir ci bya /üîΩ// / bam po gnyis pa /üîΩgal te gtan tshigs kyi nus pa @143a * //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis 'dir ci bya / // / bam po gnyis pa / gal te gtan tshigs kyi nus pa @143a * //
translated: what would another valid cognition do here?

original: nyid las don de rtogs na tshad ma gzhan gyi byed pas ci bya /
analyzed: nyid las don de rtogs na tshad ma gzhan gyi byed pas ci bya /
translated: If the object is understood from the power of the reason itself, what would the activity of another valid cognition do?

original: tshad ma thams cad kyi byed pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de la ci byar yod de /
analyzed: tshad ma thams cad kyi byed pa 'jug pa gang yin pa de la ci byar yod de /
translated: What would be the point of engaging in the activity of all valid cognitions?

original: rgyu'i dbang gis byed pa'i tshogs pa de ltar 'gyur ba la ci ste 'di /
analyzed: rgyu'i dbang gis byed pa'i tshogs pa de ltar 'gyur ba la ci ste 'di /
translated: What would be the point of the collection of causes and conditions that give rise to that activity?

original: 'di ltar 'gyur zhes brgal zhing brtag pa la brten pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gyur zhes brgal zhing brtag pa la brten pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not based on a question and answer session, such as, ‚ÄúHow is it so?‚Äù

original: gal te de ltar gyur na de bden na //
analyzed: gal te de ltar gyur na de bden na //
translated: If that is so, then that is true.

original: dam bca' ba ni tshad ma ma yin te //
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni tshad ma ma yin te //
translated: But a thesis is not a means of valid cognition,

original: de las the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de las the tshom skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because doubt arises from it.

original: nye bar 'jal ba tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba tshad ma yin te /
translated: But inference is a means of valid cognition,

original: 'di yang de bzhin no zhes nye bar 'jal ba med par ni gtan tshigs las bsgrub bya mi 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang de bzhin no zhes nye bar 'jal ba med par ni gtan tshigs las bsgrub bya mi 'grub po zhe na /
translated: and without the inference, ‚ÄúThis is like that,‚Äù the probandum is not established from the reason.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: phyogs chos nyid gyur 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: phyogs chos nyid gyur 'di nyid ni //
translated: this very property of the subject

original: nye bar 'jal bar bstan pa yin //üîΩde bzhin sgra yang byas pa zhes //
analyzed: nye bar 'jal bar bstan pa yin // de bzhin sgra yang byas pa zhes //
translated: is taught to be the example.üîΩIn the same way, sound is taught to be

original: de ltar nye bar ston pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar nye bar ston pa yin //
translated: like that, that is, produced.

original: spyir 'brel pa bzung ba na //
analyzed: spyir 'brel pa bzung ba na //
translated: When the general connection is grasped,

original: ji ltar khyab pa la brten pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'grub ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar khyab pa la brten pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'grub ce na /
translated: how is impermanence, etc., established based on the pervasion?

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa khyad par la brten pa nyid kyis rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa khyad par la brten pa nyid kyis rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by depending on the particular, such as being produced.

original: khyad par gyi rten can de nyid ni /üîΩ'di yang de bzhin no zhes nye bar 'jal bar rab tu grags pa /
analyzed: khyad par gyi rten can de nyid ni / 'di yang de bzhin no zhes nye bar 'jal bar rab tu grags pa /
translated: The reason is the same in both cases.üîΩThis is also a product.

original: 'di yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: The reason is the same in both cases.

original: nye bar 'jal ba'i tshad ma gzhan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba'i tshad ma gzhan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But inference is not the only means of knowing that the reason is the same in both cases.

original: ma yin te /üîΩrjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te / rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, it is not.üîΩBecause inference is included in the other means of knowing.

original: ba lang dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'di ni ba men yin no zhes sgra'i khyad par dang 'brel pa sgrub pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'i yul yin la /
analyzed: ba lang dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'di ni ba men yin no zhes sgra'i khyad par dang 'brel pa sgrub pa ni nye bar 'jal ba'i yul yin la /
translated: The object of inference is the reason that is the same in both cases.

original: de yang rjes su dpag pa'i yul las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir der rjes su dpag pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes su dpag pa'i yul las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir der rjes su dpag pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: The object of inference is not different from the object of inference.

original: nye bar 'jal ba smra ba rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag pa gzhan 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba smra ba rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag pa gzhan 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The proponents of inference do not accept another means of knowing called comparison.

original: de'i yul ni byas pa nyid kyis 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yul ni byas pa nyid kyis 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
translated: The object of comparison is the reason that is the same in both cases.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: byas pa nyid las gzhan pa'i 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid las gzhan pa'i 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no similarity other than that which is produced.

original: dbyug thogs gnyis pas ma gtogs pa'i //
analyzed: dbyug thogs gnyis pas ma gtogs pa'i //
translated: Except for the two who hold clubs,

original: dbyug can nyid 'dra gzhan yod min //
analyzed: dbyug can nyid 'dra gzhan yod min //
translated: there is no other club-bearer who is similar.

original: de la gal te 'dra med na //
analyzed: de la gal te 'dra med na //
translated: If there is no similarity,

original: ci ltar 'di ni 'dra ba zhes /üîΩgzhan du rtogs 'gyur rgyu gzhan ni //
analyzed: ci ltar 'di ni 'dra ba zhes / gzhan du rtogs 'gyur rgyu gzhan ni //
translated: how could it be said to be similar?üîΩThe cause of the realization

original: rtogs pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: of difference is not obtained.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gal te 'brel pa mthong ba yis //
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa mthong ba yis //
translated: If, having seen the connection,

original: 'bras bu la ni rgyur brtag na //
analyzed: 'bras bu la ni rgyur brtag na //
translated: the effect is considered to be the cause,

original: de'i tshe rgyu yang rgyu nyid du //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyu yang rgyu nyid du //
translated: then at that time, the cause itself

original: mthong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: would be obtained by seeing the cause.

original: gzhan yang / gal te de la 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te de la 'dra ba ni //
translated: Moreover, if similarity exists

original: yod na ci yi phyir mi snang //
analyzed: yod na ci yi phyir mi snang //
translated: in that, why does it not appear?

original: phra @143b sogs phyir na ma mthong bar //
analyzed: phra @143b sogs phyir na ma mthong bar //
translated: Because of subtlety, etc., it is not seen,

original: de nyid du ni ci ltar rtogs //üîΩdngos po'i ngo bo la gzhan par //
analyzed: de nyid du ni ci ltar rtogs // dngos po'i ngo bo la gzhan par //
translated: so how is it known to be just that?üîΩThe nature of things does not appear

original: rnam rtog la yang snang ma yin //üîΩrang snang med pa tha dad du //
analyzed: rnam rtog la yang snang ma yin // rang snang med pa tha dad du //
translated: even in the conception of difference.üîΩThe assertion of difference

original: rnam par 'jog pa ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: rnam par 'jog pa ngo mtshar che //
translated: without the appearance of itself is amazing.

original: 'dra ba thogs med bag chags dang // 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa yis //
analyzed: 'dra ba thogs med bag chags dang // 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa yis //
translated: The conceptual thought that is related to the latent impressions of the non-existent similarity,

original: sgro btags bdag nyid yongs brtags na //
analyzed: sgro btags bdag nyid yongs brtags na //
translated: having superimposed the nature of the self,

original: de nyid du na de yod min //üîΩdngos dang 'brel phyir 'di yis ni //
analyzed: de nyid du na de yod min // dngos dang 'brel phyir 'di yis ni //
translated: does not exist in reality.üîΩBecause of the connection with the real thing,

original: don bya byed pa'i tha snyad dag /'grub yin 'dra ba nyid las ni //
analyzed: don bya byed pa'i tha snyad dag /'grub yin 'dra ba nyid las ni //
translated: this [conceptual thought] establishes the conventions of the performance of the object's function.

original: don yang mthong ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: don yang mthong ba yod ma yin //
translated: But the object is not seen from the similarity alone.

original: gal te nang khyad yod na ni //
analyzed: gal te nang khyad yod na ni //
translated: If there is an internal difference,üîΩwhy is it not cognized there?

original: der yang ci yi phyir mi rtog / gang gis don de byed pas 'dra 'gyur ba /
analyzed: der yang ci yi phyir mi rtog / gang gis don de byed pas 'dra 'gyur ba /
translated: The similarity is due to the performance of the same function by that object.

original: 'dra bar mngon par 'dod pa nyid las ni don thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra bar mngon par 'dod pa nyid las ni don thob pa ma yin te /
translated: The attainment of the object is not from the mere assertion of similarity,

original: ma he la sogs pa las 'o ma la sogs pa'i don bya ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma he la sogs pa las 'o ma la sogs pa'i don bya ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the function of obtaining milk, etc. is from a buffalo, etc.

original: 'on te de las nang gi khyad par yod de /
analyzed: 'on te de las nang gi khyad par yod de /
translated: But if there is an internal difference,

original: des na mi 'dra ba las mi 'dra ba yin gyi don bya ba de nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na mi 'dra ba las mi 'dra ba yin gyi don bya ba de nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then the difference is from the dissimilar, not from the same function of the object.

original: gal te de lta na nang gi khyad par ni phan tshun ba lang dag la yang yod pa nyid do des na mi 'dra ba dang mthun pa'i don bya ba med pas mi slu ba nyid med do //
analyzed: gal te de lta na nang gi khyad par ni phan tshun ba lang dag la yang yod pa nyid do des na mi 'dra ba dang mthun pa'i don bya ba med pas mi slu ba nyid med do //
translated: If that is so, then the difference between internal things also exists among cows, and thus there is no nondeceptive nature because there is no object that is similar.

original: gzhan yang / mi 'dra ba'i rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang / mi 'dra ba'i rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because a cognition of a dissimilar object arises,

original: mi 'dra ba gzhan du yod pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde ni 'dra ba med pa tsam las 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba gzhan du yod pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro // de ni 'dra ba med pa tsam las 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: it follows that a dissimilar object exists.üîΩIf you say that it arises from mere nonsimilarity,

original: 'dra ba yang mi 'dra ba med pa tsam la yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dra ba yang mi 'dra ba med pa tsam la yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that similarity is mere nonsimilarity.

original: 'dra ba nyid mi 'dra ba med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid mi 'dra ba med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that similarity is nonsimilarity,

original: ji ltar / dngos po dngos po med par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar / dngos po dngos po med par 'gyur //
translated: how could an existent become a non-existent?

original: mi 'dra ba med pa tsam nyid mi 'dra bar ci ste mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba med pa tsam nyid mi 'dra bar ci ste mi 'gyur te /
translated: Why wouldn‚Äôt mere nonsimilarity be dissimilar?

original: mi 'dra ba nyid ni rgol ba gnyi ga la grub pa yin la /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba nyid ni rgol ba gnyi ga la grub pa yin la /
translated: Nonsimilarity is established for both parties in the debate.

original: de med pa tsam gyis 'dra ba'i tha snyad yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dra ba gzhan rtogs pa ni don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de med pa tsam gyis 'dra ba'i tha snyad yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dra ba gzhan rtogs pa ni don med pa nyid do //
translated: and the expression ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù is completely fulfilled by the mere absence of that. Therefore, it is pointless to understand another similarity.

original: de'i phyir nye bar 'jal ba ni tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar 'jal ba ni tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, analogy is not a separate means of valid knowledge.

original: 'on te dam bca' ba'i don lung gis grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te dam bca' ba'i don lung gis grub pa'i phyir /
translated: But if you say that the meaning of the thesis is established by scripture,

original: dam bca' ba grub par byed par brjod do zhe na de lta na yang dam bca' ba la dgos pa ci yod de /
analyzed: dam bca' ba grub par byed par brjod do zhe na de lta na yang dam bca' ba la dgos pa ci yod de /
translated: and that the thesis is stated in order to establish that, then what is the point of the thesis?üîΩIn this way:

original: 'di ltar / gal te don de lung nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te don de lung nyid kyis //
translated: If the meaning is established by scripture,

original: grub na dam bca' ci zhig bya //
analyzed: grub na dam bca' ci zhig bya //
translated: what is the point of the thesis?

original: gal te don de lung gis ni //
analyzed: gal te don de lung gis ni //
translated: If the meaning is not established by scripture,

original: mi 'grub dam bca' ci zhig bya //
analyzed: mi 'grub dam bca' ci zhig bya //
translated: what is the point of the thesis?

original: lung ni tshad ma med par ni //
analyzed: lung ni tshad ma med par ni //
translated: If the meaning is not established by scripture,

original: ci ste don ni grub mi 'gyur //üîΩlung bcas don ni dam bcas pa //
analyzed: ci ste don ni grub mi 'gyur // lung bcas don ni dam bcas pa //
translated: how could the meaning be established?üîΩThe meaning of the scripture is not established

original: tsam gyis sgrub par byed ma yin //üîΩci ste shin tu goms pa las //
analyzed: tsam gyis sgrub par byed ma yin // ci ste shin tu goms pa las //
translated: merely by the thesis.

original: dam bcas gtan @144a * //
analyzed: dam bcas gtan @144a * //
translated: But if the thesis is established

original: tshigs tsam dag las //
analyzed: tshigs tsam dag las //
translated: merely by the statement of the reason,

original: de la rtogs pa grub ba yod pas //
analyzed: de la rtogs pa grub ba yod pas //
translated: then the meaning would be established by the statement of the reason alone.

original: dam bca'i tshig ni don ldan na //
analyzed: dam bca'i tshig ni don ldan na //
translated: If the words of the thesis have meaning,

original: de tshe'ang shin tu goms pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de tshe'ang shin tu goms pa'i phyir //
translated: then at that time, because of being very familiar,

original: yan lag lda tshig ga la yod //
analyzed: yan lag lda tshig ga la yod //
translated: how could there be words with parts?

original: phyogs nyid kyis ni bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyogs nyid kyis ni bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the position itself is taught,

original: de tshe dam bcas de yang med //
analyzed: de tshe dam bcas de yang med //
translated: at that time, that thesis also does not exist.

original: 'o na ji ltar 'di skad ces //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'di skad ces //
translated: Well then, how is it said

original: nged kyi ltar na ni phyogs bstan pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: nged kyi ltar na ni phyogs bstan pa gang yin pa de /
translated: that according to us, whatever is taught as a position

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid du yin no zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid du yin no zhes brjod ce na /
translated: is not a proof, but rather is the domain of the reason?

original: de nyid smras pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid smras pa ni /
translated: That very thing is stated:

original: gal te yul bstan med par ni //
analyzed: gal te yul bstan med par ni //
translated: If the domain is not taught,

original: gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: because the reason does not engage,

original: yul bstan pa dag nyid las ni //
analyzed: yul bstan pa dag nyid las ni //
translated: from the teaching of the domain itself,

original: nus pa grub par 'dod ce na //
analyzed: nus pa grub par 'dod ce na //
translated: is it asserted that the capacity is established?

original: byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de tsam las mi rtag pa yin par brjod na /
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de tsam las mi rtag pa yin par brjod na /
translated: If one says because it is produced, just that much is stated, but impermanence is not expressed.

original: gang mi rtag pa grub pa mi shes te /
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa grub pa mi shes te /
translated: One does not know what is established as impermanent.

original: des na sgra mi rtag go zhes dam bca' gzhan nye bar blang ba yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra mi rtag go zhes dam bca' gzhan nye bar blang ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the other thesis sound is impermanent is taken up.

original: de dang ni gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid dam gzhan du nye bar len kyang bla ste /
analyzed: de dang ni gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid dam gzhan du nye bar len kyang bla ste /
translated: It is better to take the reason itself as the object, or to take something else as the object.

original: thams cad du dag 'di gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du dag 'di gnas pa yin te /
translated: But in all cases, the object must be present,

original: yul ma bstan na gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar yul bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yul ma bstan na gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar yul bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: because if the object is not stated, the reason cannot be applied. Therefore, the object must be stated without fail.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i sngon rol du gdon mi za bar yod pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i sngon rol du gdon mi za bar yod pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, prior to the proof of the probandum, the existence of the reason is established without fail.

original: de ma yin na sgrub par byed pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma yin na sgrub par byed pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then the reason would not exist.

original: tshad ma'i 'bras bu nye bar 'god pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'bras bu nye bar 'god pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the result of the valid cognition is stated,

original: bstan pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu dang / dam bca' ba dang / phyogs zhes ming gzhan byas pas legs pa thob pa ma yin de ni zur zer la 'khor lo zhes brjod pa zhes bya ba'i tshul der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu dang / dam bca' ba dang / phyogs zhes ming gzhan byas pas legs pa thob pa ma yin de ni zur zer la 'khor lo zhes brjod pa zhes bya ba'i tshul der 'gyur ro //
translated: then the statement is not the result of the valid cognition, nor is it the thesis or the position, because it is not well known. It would be like saying that a wheel is a spoke.

original: des na yul bstan pa nyid las de'i nus pa 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: des na yul bstan pa nyid las de'i nus pa 'grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is stated and that its capacity is established,üîΩthen the object is not stated.

original: 'di la the tshom la sogs pa dag kyang rgyu nyid du thal lo zhes brjod zin to //üîΩyul bstan de yang khyab pa ni //üîΩsngon 'gro can gyi tshig gam ni //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom la sogs pa dag kyang rgyu nyid du thal lo zhes brjod zin to // yul bstan de yang khyab pa ni // sngon 'gro can gyi tshig gam ni //
translated: We have already explained that doubt and so on are also the cause of the thesis.üîΩThe statement of the object to be knownüîΩis either pervasion

original: gzhan du rjod par byed 'gyur na //
analyzed: gzhan du rjod par byed 'gyur na //
translated: or the statement of the reason.

original: de ni gnyi ga'ang legs pa min //
analyzed: de ni gnyi ga'ang legs pa min //
translated: Neither of these is good.

original: dam bca' bas yul bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di la dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: dam bca' bas yul bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di la dpyad par bya ste /
translated: This should be analyzed: Is the object to be known the thesis?

original: ci khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba la yin nam /
analyzed: ci khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba la yin nam /
translated: Is it the statement of the pervasion that is preceded by the application?

original: 'on te / lnga pas gtan tshigs bstan pa la yin /
analyzed: 'on te / lnga pas gtan tshigs bstan pa la yin /
translated: Or is it the statement of the reason by the fifth case?

original: de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur /
