translated: What follows from that?üîΩIn the case of the pervasion that is preceded by the application,

original: khyab sngon can la de med kyang //üîΩsgra ni byas yin 'di 'dra kun //
analyzed: khyab sngon can la de med kyang // sgra ni byas yin 'di 'dra kun //
translated: even though that is not stated,

original: mi rtag ces ni brjod pas kyang //
analyzed: mi rtag ces ni brjod pas kyang //
translated: the statement ‚ÄúSound is impermanent because it is a product‚Äù

original: don gyi de ni 'jig blor 'gyur //
analyzed: don gyi de ni 'jig blor 'gyur //
translated: causes the mind to understand the object.

original: gang byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang byas pa de thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that ‚ÄúWhatever is a product is impermanent,‚Äù

original: @144b thams cad nye bar bsdus nas khyab pa bstan na /
analyzed: @144b thams cad nye bar bsdus nas khyab pa bstan na /
translated: when the pervasion is stated by including all,

original: des khyab pa'i byas pa nyid de la nye bar bstan pa la de lta bu nyid do zhes te sgra mi rtag pa nyid do snyam du shes pa nyid pas yul nye bar bstan pa'i don gyi dam bcas pa'i tshig gis ci bya ste /
analyzed: des khyab pa'i byas pa nyid de la nye bar bstan pa la de lta bu nyid do zhes te sgra mi rtag pa nyid do snyam du shes pa nyid pas yul nye bar bstan pa'i don gyi dam bcas pa'i tshig gis ci bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äújust‚Äù indicates that the reason, being produced, is pervaded by the predicate, being impermanent. Since one understands that the object is indicated by the word ‚Äúimpermanent,‚Äù what is the point of the words of the thesis that indicate the object?

original: yul gzhan nyid du rab tu grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gzhan nyid du rab tu grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object is established as something else.

original: ci ste dam bca' ba'i tshig med par ci ltar gtan tshigs 'gal bar nges she na /
analyzed: ci ste dam bca' ba'i tshig med par ci ltar gtan tshigs 'gal bar nges she na /
translated: But if there are no words of a thesis, how can one ascertain that the reason is contradictory?

original: nyes pa 'di ni med do //üîΩphyir rgol ba dag 'gal ba ni //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni med do // phyir rgol ba dag 'gal ba ni //
translated: This fault does not exist.üîΩBecause the opponent

original: yongs su shes par 'gyur snyam pas //
analyzed: yongs su shes par 'gyur snyam pas //
translated: will understand the contradiction.

original: dam bca' byed pa ma yin te //üîΩrang gnod pa la ci ltar brtson //
analyzed: dam bca' byed pa ma yin te // rang gnod pa la ci ltar brtson //
translated: The thesis is not statedüîΩbecause it would be pointless.

original: dam bca'i tshig ma sbyar na /üîΩci ltar gtan tshigs de ni 'gal ba yin no zhes /
analyzed: dam bca'i tshig ma sbyar na / ci ltar gtan tshigs de ni 'gal ba yin no zhes /
translated: If the words of the thesis are not stated,üîΩhow can others understand that the reason is contradictory?

original: gzhan dag gis shes zhes bya ba'i rgol ba 'di su la yin /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis shes zhes bya ba'i rgol ba 'di su la yin /
translated: To whom is this objection raised?

original: rgol ba la'o zhe na /
analyzed: rgol ba la'o zhe na /
translated: To the opponent.

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not correct.

original: legs pa nyid thog tu bab ste phyir rgol bas ma shes mod nges de la bde blag bsgrub bas ci bya /
analyzed: legs pa nyid thog tu bab ste phyir rgol bas ma shes mod nges de la bde blag bsgrub bas ci bya /
translated: It is good that this has happened, for the opponent has not understood. What can be done?

original: bstan bcos byed pas khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba bya bar bstan pa la /üîΩ'gal ba med pa'i phyir na rgol ba la phan pa chen pos byas pas na bstan bcos byed pa'i nyes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pas khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba bya bar bstan pa la / 'gal ba med pa'i phyir na rgol ba la phan pa chen pos byas pas na bstan bcos byed pa'i nyes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The treatise is taught to be a syllogistic statement that is pervaded by the author of the treatise.üîΩSince there is no contradiction, the treatise is not faulty because it is composed for the great benefit of the opponent.

original: de ni rgol ba la gnod pa'i don du bstan bcos byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni rgol ba la gnod pa'i don du bstan bcos byed pa ma yin no //
translated: For it is not the case that the treatise is composed for the purpose of harming the opponent.

original: phyir rgol la rjes su gzung bar bya ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: phyir rgol la rjes su gzung bar bya ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: It is for the purpose of assisting the opponent.

original: gzhan la ci ste sdang ste 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ci ste sdang ste 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Why be angry with others? This is nonsense.

original: gzhan yang / gal te sgra ni rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te sgra ni rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, if it is argued that sound is permanent because it is produced,

original: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar 'dir 'gal ba brtsad pa yin na /
analyzed: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar 'dir 'gal ba brtsad pa yin na /
translated: then this is a contradiction because whatever is produced is impermanent.

original: de'i tshe smyon pa ma yin pa su yang de nyid kyi tshe rtag pa nyid du dam bcas nas mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa nye bar ston par byed pa ni med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe smyon pa ma yin pa su yang de nyid kyi tshe rtag pa nyid du dam bcas nas mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa nye bar ston par byed pa ni med do //
translated: At that time, no one who is not insane, having asserted permanence, would demonstrate the pervasion by impermanence.

original: 'on te rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa nye bar ston par byed na /
analyzed: 'on te rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa nye bar ston par byed na /
translated: But if he demonstrates the pervasion by permanence,

original: de'i tshe khyab pa phyin ci log nyid las 'gal ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe khyab pa phyin ci log nyid las 'gal ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, he would realize contradiction from the pervasion being erroneous.üîΩMoreover, in the context of ‚ÄúSound is permanent because of being produced,‚Äù the statement of contradiction depends on the application of the thesis.

original: gzhan yang sgra rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i skabs su dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de la ltos nas 'gal ba brjod pa 'am 'on te dam bcas pa med par glo bur thor thungs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i ngag la yid 'byung bar
analyzed: gzhan yang sgra rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i skabs su dam bca' ba'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de la ltos nas 'gal ba brjod pa 'am 'on te dam bcas pa med par glo bur thor thungs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i ngag la yid 'byung bar
translated: But if it is a spontaneous, random statement of contradiction,

original: 'gyur ba des na /
analyzed: 'gyur ba des na /
translated: then it is not a statement of contradiction.

original: gang gi phyir dam bcas pas skabs kyi don rig par bya ba'i phyir de nye bar sbyor ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dam bcas pas skabs kyi don rig par bya ba'i phyir de nye bar sbyor ba yin na /
translated: Because the thesis is applied in order to make the meaning of the context known,

original: 'di la brjod pa skabs med par ni dam bca' ba brjod pa yang glog bur thor thungs nyid do //üîΩphyir rgol pas skabs @145a * //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa skabs med par ni dam bca' ba brjod pa yang glog bur thor thungs nyid do // phyir rgol pas skabs @145a * //
translated: But this is not the occasion to discuss this, so even the statement of the thesis is like a flash of lightning.

original: byas so zhe na /
analyzed: byas so zhe na /
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúI have made the occasion.üîΩ‚Äù

original: dam bca' ba'i tshig gi bya rgyu byas zin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i tshig gi bya rgyu byas zin par 'gyur te /
translated: The statement of the thesis has already done its job.

original: spros pas chog go //
analyzed: spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough of this elaboration!

original: gal te dam bca' ba med na sgrub pa ma tshad bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te dam bca' ba med na sgrub pa ma tshad bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If there is no thesis, is there not a fault of incompleteness of the proof?

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said,

original: dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams las gang mang rung ba cig dang bral na yang ma tshang ba yin zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba la sogs pa rnams las gang mang rung ba cig dang bral na yang ma tshang ba yin zhes brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf any one of the parts of the thesis and so on is missing, it is said to be incomplete.‚Äù

original: de sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin na /
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin na /
translated: If it is a part of the proof,

original: ma tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: ma tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then there would be incompleteness.

original: dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa'i bzlog pa nyid do //
analyzed: dam bca' ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin pa'i bzlog pa nyid do //
translated: But the thesis is not a part of the proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur na /
translated: If there is incompleteness of the parts of the proof,

original: dam bcas par ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bcas par ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: then the thesis is not a part of the proof.

original: 'di ltar ; phyogs bstan pa ni med na yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar ; phyogs bstan pa ni med na yang //
translated: even if the position is not stated,

original: 'grub pa la ni gegs med phyir //
analyzed: 'grub pa la ni gegs med phyir //
translated: there is no impediment to establishing the thesis.

original: gsum las tshul gang rung pa nyid //
analyzed: gsum las tshul gang rung pa nyid //
translated: Therefore, the absence of one of the three modes

original: ma bstan ma tshang yin par brjod //üîΩde dang ma 'brel pa de ni de'i yan lag ma yin la /
analyzed: ma bstan ma tshang yin par brjod // de dang ma 'brel pa de ni de'i yan lag ma yin la /
translated: is said to be a non-establishment of the reason.üîΩThat which is not related to that is not a part of it.

original: de ma tshang bas ma tshang ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ma tshang bas ma tshang ba yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not non-established due to the absence of one part.

original: mkho ba med pas kyang ma tshang bar 'gyur na ni ;
analyzed: mkho ba med pas kyang ma tshang bar 'gyur na ni ;
translated: If it were non-established due to lack of necessity,

original: mkho ba med pa rnams mtha' med pas ma tshang ba med pas ma tshang ba med pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mkho ba med pa rnams mtha' med pas ma tshang ba med pas ma tshang ba med pa nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: since there is no end to what is unnecessary, there would be no non-establishment due to non-establishment.

original: 'on te nye bar mkho ba med pa med kyang ma tshang ba ma yin na /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar mkho ba med pa med kyang ma tshang ba ma yin na /
translated: But if it is not non-established even without necessity,

original: de ltar yin na dam bcas pa'i tshig med pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar yin na dam bcas pa'i tshig med pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: then it would be the same even if the statement of the thesis is absent.

original: brtsad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: brtsad par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should not be disputed.

original: gal te dam bca' bsgrub par byed pa khas len na /
analyzed: gal te dam bca' bsgrub par byed pa khas len na /
translated: If one accepts that the thesis is established,

original: de'i tshe dam bcas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'o zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ha cang khyab chos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe dam bcas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'o zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ha cang khyab chos par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, the definition of a thesis would be too broad, since it would be said that ‚Äúthe statement of the probandum is the thesis.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa yin yang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa yin yang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the statement of a reason that is not established would also be a thesis, because it would be a statement of the probandum, even though the probandum is not established, and it would be a proof.

original: gang zhig dam bcas pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de la ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid yin /
analyzed: gang zhig dam bcas pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de la ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid yin /
translated: But that which is not a proof of the thesis is a thesis, since it is said that ‚Äúthe statement of the probandum is the thesis.‚Äù

original: yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dam bca' bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dam bca' bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, a fallacious reason would not be a thesis,

original: sgrub par byed bar gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan par dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed bar gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan par dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be a thesis that is a statement of the probandum, but is not a proof.

original: de'i phyir / bsgrub bya brjod pa dam bca' na'ang //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bsgrub bya brjod pa dam bca' na'ang //
translated: Therefore,

original: smra de la skyen 'thad min te //
analyzed: smra de la skyen 'thad min te //
translated: it is not tenable to say thatüîΩthe statement of the probandum is a thesis.

original: sgrub byed dbang du byas nyid kyis //
analyzed: sgrub byed dbang du byas nyid kyis //

original: gtan tshigs lhar snang thal min phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs lhar snang thal min phyir //
translated: because the reason is not a pseudo-reason.

original: sgrub par byed pa yin na ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yin na ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were a proof, it would not be a pseudo-reason.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir der thal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir der thal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it does not follow that it is a proof,

original: gtan @145b tshigs ltar snang ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan @145b tshigs ltar snang ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a pseudo-reason is considered to be a proof.

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid med pas dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid med pas dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the thesis is not taught, there is no definition of a thesis, so teaching a pseudo-reason is not a thesis.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba yin gyi /
translated: If the teaching of the thesis is a thesis,

original: sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir /

original: ci ltar sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba dam bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba dam bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how could it follow that the pseudo-reason is a thesis?

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di la /

analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan ba sgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni yin na ni /

original: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba dam bca' bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba dam bca' bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time, what appears to be a proof would not be a thesis,

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'on kyang bstan par bya ba ma bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bstan par bya ba ma bstan par 'gyur te /

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa zhes bya gang bstan pa yin pa mi shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa zhes bya gang bstan pa yin pa mi shes par 'gyur ro //

original: 'on te gang zhig bsgrub bya nyid du 'os pa de bstan pa yin no zhe na ;
analyzed: 'on te gang zhig bsgrub bya nyid du 'os pa de bstan pa yin no zhe na ;
translated: But if what is suitable to be the probandum is taught,

original: de'i tshe yang ci ltar bstan zhes skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du'am sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes khyad par med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang ci ltar bstan zhes skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du'am sgrub par byed pa nyid du zhes khyad par med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, since the context of how it is taught is not taught, it would be a thesis, because there is no distinction between what is taught as the probandum and what is taught as the proof.

original: ci ltar na lda pa 'am gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'am bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan zhes brjod par bya /
analyzed: ci ltar na lda pa 'am gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'am bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan zhes brjod par bya /

original: lnga pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang pos bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lnga pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang pos bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the first statement of the proof is the statement of the thesis,

original: 'di gang las /
analyzed: 'di gang las /
translated: then what is the point of the second?

original: de ltar sgra'i don grags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar sgra'i don grags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the meaning of the words is well known in the world,

original: gal te de lta na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid mi bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa zhes dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid mi bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: then you should not state the definition of a thesis as ‚Äúthat which is to be stated as the probandum.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid du dam bcas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten na yang sgra'i don du grags pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid du dam bcas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten na yang sgra'i don du grags pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the words in the world is that a thesis is that which is to be stated as the probandum.

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i don du yin no zhes 'chad bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i don du yin no zhes 'chad bar 'gyur ro //
translated: We will explain that the definition of a position is for the purpose of eliminating misconceptions.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir mtshan nyid don med pas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir mtshan nyid don med pas na /
translated: Therefore, since the statement of the probandum is the thesis, the definition is pointless.

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the statement of the probandum is the thesis itself,

original: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it would follow that a pseudo-reason would also be a thesis.

original: khyed kyi phyogs la yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pas ji ltar gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dam bca' ba ma yin zhe na /üîΩsgrub par byed pa nyid du ma gyur @146a * //
analyzed: khyed kyi phyogs la yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pas ji ltar gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dam bca' ba ma yin zhe na / sgrub par byed pa nyid du ma gyur @146a * //
translated: In your system, the statement of the probandum is the thesis itself. So how could a pseudo-reason not be a thesis?

original: pa'i sgrub bya bstan pa zhes bya bas de spangs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: pa'i sgrub bya bstan pa zhes bya bas de spangs pa ma yin nam /
translated: It is not that it is excluded because it is called a statement of the probandum that is not a proof.

original: gal te sgrub par byed par gyur pa yang brgya la 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed par gyur pa yang brgya la 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it were a proof, it would be a proof.

original: the tshom ldog pa'i rgyu rigs mi mthun pa nyid yin zhes brjod do //
analyzed: the tshom ldog pa'i rgyu rigs mi mthun pa nyid yin zhes brjod do //
translated: We say that the cause of the cessation of doubt is the discordant reason.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / khyad par med par brjod na yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / khyad par med par brjod na yang //
translated: even if it is stated without distinction,

original: rigs gcig the tshom skye 'gyur te //
analyzed: rigs gcig the tshom skye 'gyur te //
translated: doubt arises from a single reason.

original: gzhan du bsgrub bya brjod pa kun //
analyzed: gzhan du bsgrub bya brjod pa kun //

original: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //

original: re zhig rtsod pa ni rtsod pa lhur len pas brtsad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: re zhig rtsod pa ni rtsod pa lhur len pas brtsad par bya ba yin te /
translated: For the time being, a debate is an argument, since it is a dispute.

original: bum pa bya'o zhes bsgrub par bya bstan pa dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa bya'o zhes bsgrub par bya bstan pa dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that the statement of the probandum, ‚Äúa pot is to be made,‚Äù is a thesis.

original: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it is governed by the reason that causes understanding, the statement of the probandum that depends on it is a thesis.

original: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di 'grub po ;
analyzed: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba yang dam bca' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di 'grub po ;
translated: If that is so, then because the probandum that is not established is a thesis, it is established that even a pseudo-reason is not a thesis.

original: / gal te grub brjod sgrub byed phyir //
analyzed: / gal te grub brjod sgrub byed phyir //
translated: If others say that because the statement of the established is a reason,

original: gzhan dag la yang skyon med na //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang skyon med na //
translated: there is no fault in it,

original: da ni bsgrub bya bstan pa dag / ci ltar sgrub byed yan lag yin //
analyzed: da ni bsgrub bya bstan pa dag / ci ltar sgrub byed yan lag yin //

original: gal te gzhan dag kyang 'di skad du brjod de /
analyzed: gal te gzhan dag kyang 'di skad du brjod de /

analyzed: sgrub par byed par gyur pa'i bsgrub bya bstan pa dam bca' ba yin no //
translated: The thesis is the statement of the probandum, which is to be established.

original: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: A pseudo-proof is not a proof,

original: ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i phyir ro //

original: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ni dam bcas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ni dam bcas pa ma yin te /

original: dam bca' ba ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /

original: gal te ma grub pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin na ma grub pa'i don gyis dam bca' ba yang ci ltar sgrub par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te ma grub pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin na ma grub pa'i don gyis dam bca' ba yang ci ltar sgrub par byed par 'gyur /

analyzed: dam bca' ba ni ma grub pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa yin te /

original: gal te grub na ni yul nye bar ston pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te grub na ni yul nye bar ston pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it were established, it would not be a presentation of the object.

original: gal te de ltar na sgrub par byed par snang ba yang dam bca' ba nyid kyis sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i mi zlogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te de ltar na sgrub par byed par snang ba yang dam bca' ba nyid kyis sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba'i mi zlogs pa nyid do //

original: dam bca' ba nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub par byed par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: dam bca' ba nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub par byed par 'gyur mod /

original: 'di la skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'di la skyon ci yod ce na /

original: ma grub pa nyid skyon du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid skyon du mi 'gyur ro //

original: dam bcas pa ni dam bcas pas sgrub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bcas pa ni dam bcas pas sgrub pa ma yin te /

original: des na skyon nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: des na skyon nyid do zhe na /

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis ni 'di ltar sgrub par byed pa ma yin /

analyzed: de nyid ni de'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /

original: sgra'i phur ma tsam yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i phur ma tsam yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: thams cad du brjod par bya ba sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de'i phyir dngos dang brgyud pas de la grub pa mi skye ba'i phyir dam bca' ba ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //

analyzed: gzhan dag brjod pa ni dam bcas pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar / ltar snang bcas sogs bkod pa dang // lan ni 'brel med bzhad gad de // 'di ltar de ni rigs pa nyid //

analyzed: rig byed kyi khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod na /

original: rig byed la khyad par ci zhig yod /

translated: The statement,

analyzed: gang zhig gzhan du 'don par mi nus pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not possible to draw out the other,

original: 'di ni len ma yin te /
