analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'gal ba med pa'i khyad par gyis ni de las gtan tshigs bzlog par mi nus so //
translated: The reason cannot be reversed from that by the distinction of not being in opposition to the discordant class.

original: de lta ma yin na de lta bu ma yin pa zhes bya ba sus brjod par mi nus //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de lta bu ma yin pa zhes bya ba sus brjod par mi nus //
translated: If it were otherwise, then it would be impossible to say that it is not like that.

original: de'i phyir / bkod pa dang lan la sogs pa 'di ni rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir / bkod pa dang lan la sogs pa 'di ni rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because this arrangement of the reason and response, etc. is not appropriate,

original: dam bca' bsgrub @147a * //
analyzed: dam bca' bsgrub @147a * //
translated: the thesis is what is to be established.

original: par byed pa yin la sngar bshad pa sun 'byin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: par byed pa yin la sngar bshad pa sun 'byin pa nyid yin no //
translated: The earlier explanation is just a refutation.

original: gal te 'o na dam bca' ba nges par bstan par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na dam bca' ba nges par bstan par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: If you say that the thesis is not to be stated,

original: de lta na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ci'i don du yin /
analyzed: de lta na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid ci'i don du yin /
translated: then what is the point of the definition of the position?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i don ni gtan tshigs kyi nus pas go bar bya ba nyid yin pas de phyogs yin nam de lta ma yin yang rung ste dpyad pa 'dis ci bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i don ni gtan tshigs kyi nus pas go bar bya ba nyid yin pas de phyogs yin nam de lta ma yin yang rung ste dpyad pa 'dis ci bya ste /
translated: The point of the probandum is to be understood by the power of the reason, so whether it is the position or not, what is the use of this analysis?

original: ci ltar rtogs pa de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rtogs pa de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the proof is like the thing to be established,

original: de ni bden te /üîΩbsgrub brjod rtogs pa'i don can nyid //
analyzed: de ni bden te / bsgrub brjod rtogs pa'i don can nyid //
translated: that is true,üîΩbut the definition is not the same as the thing to be established,

original: yin yang rmongs med phyir mtshan nyid //üîΩngo bo tshigs phrad bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: yin yang rmongs med phyir mtshan nyid // ngo bo tshigs phrad bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: because there is no confusion.üîΩThe definition is held to be the meeting of the essence and the words.

original: tshig gis de yi mtshan nyid bzhi //
analyzed: tshig gis de yi mtshan nyid bzhi //
translated: The definition has four parts:

original: ma grub sgrub byed min don brjod ;
analyzed: ma grub sgrub byed min don brjod ;
translated: the unestablished, the means of establishment, the expression of the meaning,

original: ; rgol bas khas blangs pa bzung ngo //
analyzed: ; rgol bas khas blangs pa bzung ngo //
translated: and the acceptance of the opponent.

original: mtshan nyid ces bya ba thams cad ni rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ces bya ba thams cad ni rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan pa yin te /
translated: All that is called the definition is taught in order to remove confusion.

original: brjod pa gzhan yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: brjod pa gzhan yang de bzhin no //
translated: The other expressions are the same.

original: de la bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos kyi yul la /
analyzed: de la bsgrub par bya ba dang cig shos kyi yul la /
translated: With regard to the object of the thing to be established and the other,

original: chen po rnams kyang phyin ci log tu log par rtogs pa chen po yod la /
analyzed: chen po rnams kyang phyin ci log tu log par rtogs pa chen po yod la /
translated: there is a great error of misunderstanding,

original: de ma bzlog na yang don ma yin pa'i sgo nas chen po'i tshul skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de ma bzlog na yang don ma yin pa'i sgo nas chen po'i tshul skyed par byed do //
translated: and if that is not removed, a great way of non-meaning is generated.

original: nyes pa dang 'brel pa ma bzlog pa ni dge ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa dang 'brel pa ma bzlog pa ni dge ba ma yin no //
translated: Not removing the connection with faults is not virtuous.

original: 'di ltar mi la sogs pa gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba la gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub bya ma yin pa la yang bsgrub byar brjod cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar mi la sogs pa gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba la gzhan gyi don tsam bsgrub bya ma yin pa la yang bsgrub byar brjod cing /
translated: Thus, it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the welfare of others, such as humans, even though the welfare of others is not the object of attainment.

original: bdag gi don nyid bsgrub bya yin yang ;üîΩbsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / bstan bcos tshad mar smra ba bstan bcos las grub pa yang /
analyzed: bdag gi don nyid bsgrub bya yin yang ; bsgrub bya ma yin pa dang / bstan bcos tshad mar smra ba bstan bcos las grub pa yang /
translated: And it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the welfare of others, even though the welfare of oneself is the object of attainment.üîΩAnd it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the object of attainment, even though the object of attainment is taught in the treatise by the proponent of valid knowledge.üîΩAnd it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the object of attainment, even though the object of attainment is taught in the treatise by the proponent of valid knowledge.üîΩAnd it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the object of attainment, even though the object of attainment is taught in the treatise by the proponent of valid knowledge.

original: bsgrub byar brjod pa dang / dam bca' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid 'dis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa la yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang rtogs pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya ma yin pa khas ma blangs kyang /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes log par rtogs te /
analyzed: bsgrub byar brjod pa dang / dam bca' ba ni bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid 'dis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa la yang phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang rtogs pa dang / bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya ma yin pa khas ma blangs kyang /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba nyid du zhes log par rtogs te /
translated: And it is said that the purpose of the treatise is to establish the object of attainment, even though the object of attainment is taught in the treatise by the proponent of valid knowledge.

original: des na de bsal ba'i phyir rang gi ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang / 'dod pa dang rang nyid kyi tshig bzhis ma grub pa dang / sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang / don gyis brjod pa dang / rgol bas khas blangs pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: des na de bsal ba'i phyir rang gi ngo bo dang tshig phrad dang / 'dod pa dang rang nyid kyi tshig bzhis ma grub pa dang / sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang / don gyis brjod pa dang / rgol bas khas blangs pa gzung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to eliminate that, one should understand that the four phrases ‚Äúown nature,‚Äù ‚Äúphrase,‚Äù ‚Äúdesire,‚Äù and ‚Äúone‚Äôs own words‚Äù are not established, are not established by a proof, are expressed by the meaning, and are accepted by the opponent.

original: ma grub pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin la de bzhin du gzhan yang ste /
analyzed: ma grub pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin la de bzhin du gzhan yang ste /
translated: Only what is not established is to be established, and likewise, others.

original: des na nges par gzung bas phyin ci log de gsal bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: des na nges par gzung bas phyin ci log de gsal bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, through ascertainment, that error should be understood to be eliminated.

original: de la rigs pa ni /
analyzed: de la rigs pa ni /
translated: Regarding that, the reasoning is this:

original: gal te tshad mar gyur pa'i bstan bcos nyid las don 'di 'grub na /
analyzed: gal te tshad mar gyur pa'i bstan bcos nyid las don 'di 'grub na /
translated: If this meaning is established from the treatise itself, which is a valid means of knowledge,

original: @147b tshad ma gzhan gyi bsgrubs pas ci bya /
analyzed: @147b tshad ma gzhan gyi bsgrubs pas ci bya /
translated: what is the use of establishing it by another valid means of knowledge?

original: gzhan la bstan bcos tshad ma ma yin pa des na de'i don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan la bstan bcos tshad ma ma yin pa des na de'i don du yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is for the sake of others, since the treatise is not a valid means of knowledge for others,

original: bdag nyid la ci ltar na tshad ma yin /
analyzed: bdag nyid la ci ltar na tshad ma yin /
translated: how is it a valid means of knowledge for oneself?

original: khas blangs pa nyid kyis so zhe na /
analyzed: khas blangs pa nyid kyis so zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is by mere assertion,

original: gzhan gyis kyang khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: it should be accepted by others as well.

original: de bzhin du gal te de bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te de bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: Likewise, if it is to be established,

original: ci ltar sgrub byed nyid du ston //
analyzed: ci ltar sgrub byed nyid du ston //
translated: how can it be shown to be the means of establishment?

original: don gyi brjod pa bsgrub bya ma yin na ngag gi do shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: don gyi brjod pa bsgrub bya ma yin na ngag gi do shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the expression of the meaning is not to be established, then the statement is not the means of knowledge.

original: gzhan du yang grub pa la nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du yang grub pa la nyid do //
translated: Otherwise, it would be established elsewhere.

original: skabs dang / don dang sgra gzhan nye ba dag las sgra'i don nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs dang / don dang sgra gzhan nye ba dag las sgra'i don nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the word is ascertained from the context, the meaning, and the proximity of other words.

original: skabs mi shes pas ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don mi rtogs pa'i phyir de dang lhan cig tu tha snyad kyi lam du ci ltar 'jug / de skad du yang rab tu brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: skabs mi shes pas ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don mi rtogs pa'i phyir de dang lhan cig tu tha snyad kyi lam du ci ltar 'jug / de skad du yang rab tu brjod pa yin te /
translated: Since one who does not know the context does not understand the meaning that is intended to be expressed, how can one engage in the path of convention together with that?üîΩIt is said in this way:

original: dngos su brjod pa'i don ni phyugs kyis kyang 'dzin pas de la nus pa khyad par du 'phags pa ci yod ce'o //
analyzed: dngos su brjod pa'i don ni phyugs kyis kyang 'dzin pas de la nus pa khyad par du 'phags pa ci yod ce'o //
translated: Since the meaning that is directly expressed is grasped even by cattle, what special ability is there in that?

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: ma brjod na yang 'dod pas khyab //
analyzed: ma brjod na yang 'dod pas khyab //
translated: Even if not expressed, it is pervaded by what is intended.

original: bdag gi don gzhan bsgrub byar 'dod ;
analyzed: bdag gi don gzhan bsgrub byar 'dod ;
translated: The other meaning is intended to be established.

original: / dper na 'dus pa'i bdag nyid rnams gzhan gyi don du sgrub pa na /
analyzed: / dper na 'dus pa'i bdag nyid rnams gzhan gyi don du sgrub pa na /
translated: For example, when one who is of a congregating nature is engaged in the welfare of others,üîΩalthough he does not state his own welfare, he does have it as his goal.

original: bdag gi don de ni ma brjod kyang 'dod pas khyab pa'i bsgrub bya yin zhes bstan pa'i don du 'dod pa smos so //
analyzed: bdag gi don de ni ma brjod kyang 'dod pas khyab pa'i bsgrub bya yin zhes bstan pa'i don du 'dod pa smos so //
translated: The word goal is stated in order to show that.

original: 'dod pas khyab po zhes bya ba de nyid ga las she na /
analyzed: 'dod pas khyab po zhes bya ba de nyid ga las she na /
translated: If one asks, Why is it pervaded by the goal?

original: skabs las so //
analyzed: skabs las so //
translated: It is because of the context.

original: skabs dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: skabs dang rjes su mthun par 'dod pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The goal arises in accordance with the context.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: rtogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it would follow, absurdly, that it would not be understood.

original: 'di ltar gal te skabs su gzhan bab la skabs su bab pa ni gzhan yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te skabs su gzhan bab la skabs su bab pa ni gzhan yin la /
translated: Thus, if the context is different from the one at hand, and the one at hand is different from the one at hand,

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan yin na ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan yin na ni /
translated: and the probandum is different,

original: de ni rgol ba nyid ma yin skyon 'di nyid de la mod la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni rgol ba nyid ma yin skyon 'di nyid de la mod la 'gyur ro //
translated: then this fault would immediately arise for him.

original: gal te 'di bdag nyid smra na des bdag nyid la skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa'i sgo nas skyon brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di bdag nyid smra na des bdag nyid la skabs su ma bab pa brjod pa'i sgo nas skyon brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If he were to state it himself, then he would be stating a fault by stating something that is not relevant to the context.

original: de yang skyon yong mod phyir rgol ba yang yang dag pa'i skyon mi brjod pa'i phyir skyon du 'gyur ro zhen ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang skyon yong mod phyir rgol ba yang yang dag pa'i skyon mi brjod pa'i phyir skyon du 'gyur ro zhen ma yin te /
translated: If you say that this is a fault, it is not, because the opponent does not state a correct fault.

original: gal te de'i don bstan pa'i sgo nas skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te de'i don bstan pa'i sgo nas skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that this is not a fault because it teaches the meaning of the example,

original: ji skad du bdag gzhan yin zhe na ni de ma grub po zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du bdag gzhan yin zhe na ni de ma grub po zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: then we would reply that it is not established that the self is different from the aggregates, as has been explained.

original: gal te bdag gzhan yin na ni de dpe la ma grub po //
analyzed: gal te bdag gzhan yin na ni de dpe la ma grub po //
translated: If you say that the self is different from the aggregates, then it is not established in the example.

original: gal te yang gzhan tsam zhig sgrub na de'i skabs su bab pa ma bsgrubs par 'gyur pa'am /
analyzed: gal te yang gzhan tsam zhig sgrub na de'i skabs su bab pa ma bsgrubs par 'gyur pa'am /
translated: If you are proving mere difference, then you have not proven what is relevant,

original: grub pa la bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grub pa la bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
translated: or you are proving what is already established.

original: de ltar brjod pa'i phyir rgol ba la nyes pa ci yod /
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa'i phyir rgol ba la nyes pa ci yod /
translated: So what is wrong with the opponent stating this?

original: @148a * // gal te 'dod pas khyab pa ma brjod kyang //
analyzed: @148a * // gal te 'dod pas khyab pa ma brjod kyang //
translated: If you say that although the pervasion by the thesis is not stated,

original: bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yin na /
translated: it is taught as the probandum,

original: 'o na ni de bzhin mi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yang yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni de bzhin mi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yang yin par 'gyur te /
translated: then it would also be the case that the opposite of that is not accepted.

original: gang gi phyir ngag ni rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ngag ni rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because speech has the effect of exclusion.

original: mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is nothing at all that is not accepted,

original: 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because something is accepted by someone.

original: des na 'dod pa smos pa ni rgol ba 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa smos pa ni rgol ba 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mention of ‚Äúacceptance‚Äù is for the purpose of teaching that the opponent‚Äôs assertion is accepted.

original: de la ni rang nyid ces bya ba'i don 'thob pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la ni rang nyid ces bya ba'i don 'thob pa kho na'o //
translated: In that case, the meaning of ‚Äúitself‚Äù is obtained.

original: gal te bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang yin na ni de'i 'dod pa nyid yin pas de ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang yin na ni de'i 'dod pa nyid yin pas de ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: If the assertion of the author of the treatise is also accepted, then because it is accepted, it is not refuted.üîΩIf it is not accepted, then it is refuted.

original: 'dod pa ma yi pa nyid na bzlog pa yin no zhe na ma yin te 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa ma yi pa nyid na bzlog pa yin no zhe na ma yin te 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that because the mention of ‚Äúacceptance‚Äù itself refutes,

original: ci ltar phyir rgol ba dang nyan par byed pa rnams kyi 'dod pa bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes 'dod pa smos pa sgrub pa de bzhin du bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang de nyid kyis bzlog pa 'am rang nyid smos pas kyang gzhan 'dod pa thams
analyzed: ci ltar phyir rgol ba dang nyan par byed pa rnams kyi 'dod pa bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes 'dod pa smos pa sgrub pa de bzhin du bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa yang de nyid kyis bzlog pa 'am rang nyid smos pas kyang gzhan 'dod pa thams
translated: Just as the proponent states the thesis to be proven in order to establish the assertions of the opponent and the listener, in the same way, the author of the treatise would also refute the assertions of others by stating his own position.

original: cad bzlog pa'i phyir ci'i phyir slob dpon gyi rang nyid ces bya bas ni bstan bcos la mi ltos par khas blangs ston par byed do zhes bstan bcos tsam 'gog par bshad ce na /
analyzed: cad bzlog pa'i phyir ci'i phyir slob dpon gyi rang nyid ces bya bas ni bstan bcos la mi ltos par khas blangs ston par byed do zhes bstan bcos tsam 'gog par bshad ce na /
translated: Why then do you explain that the mere statement ‚Äúthe master himself‚Äù refutes the treatise, in order to show that the assertion is not dependent on the treatise?

original: 'di la lan du /
analyzed: 'di la lan du /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: gzhan 'dod thams cad bzlog na yang //
analyzed: gzhan 'dod thams cad bzlog na yang //
translated: Even if all the assertions of others are refuted,

original: 'brel par bdag nyid sgra bshad pa //
analyzed: 'brel par bdag nyid sgra bshad pa //
translated: the explanation of the term in relation to the self

original: dogs pa'i gnas ni bzlog pa ste //
analyzed: dogs pa'i gnas ni bzlog pa ste //
translated: reverses the doubtful point,

original: 'di ni de'i don byas pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i don byas pa yin //
translated: and this is the function of that.

original: gal te rgol ba la ltos pa'i 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis gzhan 'dod pa thams cad bzlog pa de ltar yin na yang /
analyzed: gal te rgol ba la ltos pa'i 'dod pa smos pa nyid kyis gzhan 'dod pa thams cad bzlog pa de ltar yin na yang /
translated: Even if all the assertions of others are refuted by the mere statement of the proponent‚Äôs assertion that depends on the opponent,

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par dogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par dogs pa nyid de /
translated: The desire of the treatise author is to prove that, and so there is doubt.

original: de lta ma yin na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin pas na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin pas na /
translated: If it were not so, then the reason would not be understood as contradicting the treatise.

original: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ni gdon mi za ba nyid du rgol ba'i yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i blor 'ga' zhig 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ni gdon mi za ba nyid du rgol ba'i yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i blor 'ga' zhig 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, some would think that the desire of the treatise author is definitely also the desire of the opponent.

original: des na dogs pa'i gnas bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos so //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir rang nyid smos pa'i dgos pas ni bstan bcos bsal ba nyid yin par bshad do //
analyzed: des na dogs pa'i gnas bzlog pa'i phyir rang nyid smos so // de nyid kyi phyir rang nyid smos pa'i dgos pas ni bstan bcos bsal ba nyid yin par bshad do //
translated: Thus, in order to eliminate that doubtful point, the author states his own name.üîΩFor that very reason, the purpose of stating his own name is explained as eliminating the treatise.

original: gang gi phyir rang nyid kyi sgras 'di ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i phyir byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang nyid kyi sgras 'di ni bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bzlog pa'i phyir byas pa yin no //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúhimself‚Äù is used in order to eliminate the desire of the treatise author.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa bzlog pa ni 'bad pa med pa nyid du grub pa yin @148b no ;
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa bzlog pa ni 'bad pa med pa nyid du grub pa yin @148b no ;
translated: The elimination of the desire of the opponent is established without effort.

original: / de'i phyir 'dod pa smos pa'i dgos pa ni ma brjod kyang 'dod pas khyab pa bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba de nyid yin te /
analyzed: / de'i phyir 'dod pa smos pa'i dgos pa ni ma brjod kyang 'dod pas khyab pa bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba de nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, although the purpose of mentioning desire is not stated, it is just that desire is the probandum.

original: 'dod pa smos pa ni gzhan gyi don zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa smos pa ni gzhan gyi don zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ma yin pa gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya nyid yin no //
translated: The mention of desire is for the sake of others. The probandum is not included in the other.

original: gal te ni chos dang / chos can dag gi khyad par yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te ni chos dang / chos can dag gi khyad par yin gyi /
translated: If it is a distinction of the property and the subject,

original: bsgrub bya ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the probandum?

original: gal te bsgrub bya nyid yin na ci ltar khyad par du 'gyur bsgrub par bya ba dang khyad par dag gcig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya nyid yin na ci ltar khyad par du 'gyur bsgrub par bya ba dang khyad par dag gcig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If it is the probandum, how can it be a distinction? The probandum and the distinction are not the same.

original: slob dpon gyis chos kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis chos kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The master has explained that it is contradictory because it proves the property as mistaken, and so on.

original: de bshad pa ni ;
analyzed: de bshad pa ni ;
translated: That is explained:

original: de ni ltos nas chos dag dang // chos can khyad par yin par brjod //
analyzed: de ni ltos nas chos dag dang // chos can khyad par yin par brjod //
translated: That is said to be a distinction of the property and the subject, depending on the other.

original: 'dod pas yul du byas pa'i bsgrub bya de ni gzhan la ltos te /
analyzed: 'dod pas yul du byas pa'i bsgrub bya de ni gzhan la ltos te /
translated: The probandum that is the object of desire is stated to be a particular in relation to another.üîΩThe other, whose wisdom is very young, says that the probandum is just that.

original: khyad par du brjod de shes rab shin tu gzhon pa gzhan dag smras pa nyid bsgrub bya yin no zhes 'di ltar mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don no zhes pha rol gyis smras pa la sun 'byin pa brjod pas bshad pa /
analyzed: khyad par du brjod de shes rab shin tu gzhon pa gzhan dag smras pa nyid bsgrub bya yin no zhes 'di ltar mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don no zhes pha rol gyis smras pa la sun 'byin pa brjod pas bshad pa /
translated: Thus, in response to the opponent‚Äôs statement, ‚ÄúThe eyes and so on are for the sake of another,‚Äù we say:

original: bdag ma grub pas dpe la ni //
analyzed: bdag ma grub pas dpe la ni //
translated: The example is not established because the self is not established.

original: de don ma grub gal te de //
analyzed: de don ma grub gal te de //
translated: If the meaning of that is not established,

original: bsgrub min 'o na khyod kyi de //
analyzed: bsgrub min 'o na khyod kyi de //
translated: then your example is not established.

original: de yi khyad par yin par 'gyur //üîΩbdag gi don ni nges kyis bsgrub bya ma yin te /
analyzed: de yi khyad par yin par 'gyur // bdag gi don ni nges kyis bsgrub bya ma yin te /
translated: If it is not to be established, then it would be a particular of that.

original: gzhan gyi don tsam sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don tsam sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThe meaning of that is not to be established because it is established for the sake of another,‚Äù

original: gal te bsgrub bya ma yin na ni de nyid kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir khyad par dang 'gal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya ma yin na ni de nyid kyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir khyad par dang 'gal par 'gyur ro //
translated: then if it is not to be established, it would be a particular of that, and so it would contradict the particular.

original: bsgrub bya nyid ci'i phyir sgrub par mi byed ce na ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid ci'i phyir sgrub par mi byed ce na ma yin te /
translated: If you ask why it is not established,

original: gzhan la ltos nas lan 'debs par bzhed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos nas lan 'debs par bzhed pa'i phyir te /
translated: we say it is not because we assert that the response depends on another.

original: de tsam gyis gzhan bzlog na rang gi phyogs bsgrub pa'i 'bad pa byas pas ci bya /
analyzed: de tsam gyis gzhan bzlog na rang gi phyogs bsgrub pa'i 'bad pa byas pas ci bya /
translated: If you refute others merely by that much, then what is the use of your effort to establish your own position?

original: da ni ci ltar ma brjod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: da ni ci ltar ma brjod pa yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: Now, how is it that what is not stated is also the thesis?

original: brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni brjod pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni brjod pa nyid yin te /
translated: The thesis is just what is stated,

original: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise there would be an absurd consequence.

original: ma brjod pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: ma brjod pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: If it is not stated, then because there is no difference, everything would be a thesis.

original: thams cad dpe la nye bar bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no//
analyzed: thams cad dpe la nye bar bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no//
translated: But it is not possible to demonstrate all things as examples.üîΩIn that case, because the opposite is established, everything would be a reason.

original: de lta na ni bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: de lta na ni bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na 'di la bshad pa /
translated: In response to this, we say:

original: ma brjod na yang 'dod pa ni //
analyzed: ma brjod na yang 'dod pa ni //
translated: Even if it is not stated,

original: skabs las rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //üîΩde dpe rjes 'gro med pa yi //
analyzed: skabs las rtogs par 'gyur ba yin // de dpe rjes 'gro med pa yi //
translated: it is understood from the context.üîΩThe fault of not following the example

original: skyon yang ji skad bdag gzhan na //üîΩde ma grub ces bshad bzhin te //
analyzed: skyon yang ji skad bdag gzhan na // de ma grub ces bshad bzhin te //
translated: is just as it was explained before.üîΩIf it is not established,

original: der ni 'dod na @149a * //
analyzed: der ni 'dod na @149a * //
translated: then it is not a reason.

original: gnod byed yin //
analyzed: gnod byed yin //
translated: are harmful.

original: gal te 'dis de nyid smras pa yin pa de lta na yang skabs kyi 'dir don ni 'di yin par lta'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dis de nyid smras pa yin pa de lta na yang skabs kyi 'dir don ni 'di yin par lta'o //
translated: Even if this is what he says, we still maintain that the meaning of the passage is as we have stated it.

original: tshig thams cad skabs la ma ltos par ni don ston par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig thams cad skabs la ma ltos par ni don ston par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: For no word can express a meaning without depending on a context.üîΩTherefore, the wise, who are intent on the good of others,

original: de'i phyir dam pa lugs gnas dag / ngag gi mthar thug brtags nas ni ;
analyzed: de'i phyir dam pa lugs gnas dag / ngag gi mthar thug brtags nas ni ;
translated: having examined the ultimate of speech,üîΩshould engage in speech

original: / ngag don nges par bya ba'i phyir //üîΩ'jug pa 'gro ba'i tshul lugs yin //
analyzed: / ngag don nges par bya ba'i phyir // 'jug pa 'gro ba'i tshul lugs yin //
translated: for the sake of ascertaining the meaning.

original: mkhas pa'i skye bo mtha' dag gi lugs ni 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i skye bo mtha' dag gi lugs ni 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is the way of the wise.

original: mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang ngag gi don ni bdag gi don to zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba 'dir yang ngag gi don ni bdag gi don to zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThe eye, etc. are for the sake of another,‚Äù is that they are for the sake of the self.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de la ltos nas dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang yin te /üîΩde bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de la ltos nas dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang yin te / de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the example is not appropriate, since it is what is to be established.

original: slob dpon gyis kyang de kho na bzhin du bstan te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis kyang de kho na bzhin du bstan te /
translated: The Master has also taught this in the same way.

original: bdag gzhan yin no zhe na ni ma grub po zhes te /
analyzed: bdag gzhan yin no zhe na ni ma grub po zhes te /
translated: If you say that the self is different from the aggregates, then your example is not established.

original: dpe la ma grub po zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dpe la ma grub po zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the example is not established.

original: des ni de'i 'dod pa phyin ci log tu grub pas na 'di 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni de'i 'dod pa phyin ci log tu grub pas na 'di 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Since the opponent‚Äôs thesis is established in a way contrary to his intention, this is a refutation of his thesis.

original: gal te skabs su bab pa'i don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar shes she na /
analyzed: gal te skabs su bab pa'i don nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar shes she na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúHow do we know that the meaning of the present context is the thesis?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: We reply:

original: gal te gang la rtsod pa yis //üîΩsgrub bkod de bsgrub bya min na //
analyzed: gal te gang la rtsod pa yis // sgrub bkod de bsgrub bya min na //
translated: If the point at issueüîΩis not the thesis,

original: bsgrub bya ci yin gzhan du na //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ci yin gzhan du na //
translated: then the thesis would be anything at all,

original: mi 'dod pa 'am 'bras med 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa 'am 'bras med 'gyur //
translated: or there would be no thesis.

original: gal te gang la rtsod pa gang las bdag 'grub pa'i bdag gi don nyid de kho na bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na /üîΩde las gzhan sgrub na yang ma 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te gang la rtsod pa gang las bdag 'grub pa'i bdag gi don nyid de kho na bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na / de las gzhan sgrub na yang ma 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: If the point at issue‚Äîthe establishment of the self‚Äîis not the thesis,üîΩthen if you establish something else, your argument would be irrelevant.

original: 'ga' yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And if it is irrelevant, then nothing would be a thesis.

original: de lta na ni phyogs gnyis sgrub pa la ltos te 'gal ba sgrub pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa 'am /
analyzed: de lta na ni phyogs gnyis sgrub pa la ltos te 'gal ba sgrub pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa 'am /
translated: In that case, since the two sides are established in dependence on each other, it would be contradictory to establish them.

original: de spangs nas sgrub na yang 'bras bu med pa grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de spangs nas sgrub na yang 'bras bu med pa grub pa la sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If you abandon the nonestablished and establish the established, then there would be no point in establishing it.

original: 'on te bdag bsgrub bya ma yin yang /
analyzed: 'on te bdag bsgrub bya ma yin yang /
translated: But even if the self is not the object to be established,

original: gzhan tsam rab tu bsgrubs pas kyang 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan tsam rab tu bsgrubs pas kyang 'grub pa yin no //
translated: it is established by merely establishing something else.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul la ni phyir rgol bas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul la ni phyir rgol bas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In the case of an object that is not the object to be established, the opponent cannot state the error of lack of pervasion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i skyon ni bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa'i skyon ni bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: This is because the errors of lack of pervasion and so on depend on the object to be established.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: gal te gzhan grub na yang sgrub bya min //
analyzed: gal te gzhan grub na yang sgrub bya min //
translated: if the other is established, it is not the object to be established.

original: 'dod 'grub de lta yin na kun 'grub 'gyur //üîΩnye ba'i khyad par med na 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: 'dod 'grub de lta yin na kun 'grub 'gyur // nye ba'i khyad par med na 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: If that is so, then everything would be established.üîΩIf there is no specific difference,

original: 'grub 'gyur gzhan min de na ga las yin //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur gzhan min de na ga las yin //
translated: then some would be established and others not. Why is that?

original: gal te gzhan @149b bsgrubs pas kyang gzhan 'grub par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te gzhan @149b bsgrubs pas kyang gzhan 'grub par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe /
translated: If it were the case that something else were established by establishing something else, then at that time

original: 'dod pa bzhin du phyin ci log kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa bzhin du phyin ci log kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: even error would be established according to one‚Äôs desire.

original: de lta yin dang / gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba dang dpe bsgrub byas stong par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta yin dang / gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba dang dpe bsgrub byas stong par 'gyur te /
translated: If that were the case, then all reasons would be contradictory and the example would be empty of the probandum,

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos kyi tshogs ni ga la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos kyi tshogs ni ga la yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a collection of phenomena that are mutually contradictory never has a common locus.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba de nyid 'grub kyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba de nyid 'grub kyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the probandum itself is established because of the desire, but not something else,

original: ma yin te 'dod pa'i dbang gis gtan tshigs kyi byed pa yul rnam par dbye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te 'dod pa'i dbang gis gtan tshigs kyi byed pa yul rnam par dbye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not so, because it is not tenable to divide the domain of the function of a reason by desire.

original: de lta yin na ni gzhan bzlog pa 'dod pa'i phyir bzlog pa grub pa dgag tu med de /
analyzed: de lta yin na ni gzhan bzlog pa 'dod pa'i phyir bzlog pa grub pa dgag tu med de /
translated: If that were the case, then it would be undeniable that the opposite is established because of the desire to reverse the other,

original: 'dod par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: 'dod par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: because there is no difference in desire.

original: gang gis rgol ba 'dod pa 'grub la phyir rgol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa 'brel pa'i khyad par yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis rgol ba 'dod pa 'grub la phyir rgol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa 'brel pa'i khyad par yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no special connection that would make the opponent's thesis true and the opponent's thesis false.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i chos rjes su 'gro ba med na skyon yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i chos rjes su 'gro ba med na skyon yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the fault is that the property to be proven does not follow from the property that is the reason,

original: gal te de lta na 'dod ba 'dod pa byed pa'i 'gal ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'dod ba 'dod pa byed pa'i 'gal ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then if that were so, there would be no contradiction at all in asserting what one wants to assert.

original: brjod pa dang ni thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa dang ni thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the expression is present in all cases.

original: brjod pas rjes su 'gro med na /
analyzed: brjod pas rjes su 'gro med na /
translated: If the property to be proven does not follow from the property that is the reason,

original: bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa nyid kyis 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa nyid kyis 'gal ba yin no //
translated: then the contradiction is established by the property to be proven being reversed.

original: khyad par 'gal ba ni ma brjod pa nyid la ltos nas yin gyi gzhan du ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par 'gal ba ni ma brjod pa nyid la ltos nas yin gyi gzhan du ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The contradiction of a distinction is based on what is not stated, not on anything else.

original: 'dis ni gnyis bcad sbyor pa la //
analyzed: 'dis ni gnyis bcad sbyor pa la //
translated: By this,

original: rjes 'gro med dang 'gal pa dag /
analyzed: rjes 'gro med dang 'gal pa dag /
translated: the absence of following and the contradictionüîΩare shown.

original: bstan pa yin no ci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba spyir 'dod na /
analyzed: bstan pa yin no ci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba spyir 'dod na /
translated: But if the probandum is asserted in general,

original: de nyid don gzhan med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid don gzhan med pa'i phyir //
translated: then that itself is not a different object.

original: lus mi 'gyur na 'grub pa yin //
analyzed: lus mi 'gyur na 'grub pa yin //
translated: If the body is not changed, it is accomplished.

original: brjod byas stong pa'i rjod byed rnams //
analyzed: brjod byas stong pa'i rjod byed rnams //
translated: The expressions are empty of the expressed.

original: 'di de mi shes kyis bslad yin //
analyzed: 'di de mi shes kyis bslad yin //
translated: This is a corruption of ignorance.

original: gnyis pa dang bcas par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba rnams la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa dang ; 'gal ba nyid kyang rigs pa 'di nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa dang bcas par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba rnams la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa dang ; 'gal ba nyid kyang rigs pa 'di nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: The fault of non-pervasion and the contradiction in the proofs of duality are also shown by this very reasoning.

original: 'di ltar tshu rol mdzes pa bdag na re /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshu rol mdzes pa bdag na re /
translated: Thus, the LokƒÅyatas say:

original: bum pa ni mngon par gsal ba'i sems pa can lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi skyes bu dang / bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can yin te /
analyzed: bum pa ni mngon par gsal ba'i sems pa can lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi skyes bu dang / bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can yin te /
translated: The pot is dual, with a person who has the characteristic of a body that is the manifestation of consciousness, and with any pot.

original: autpala ma yin pa'i phyir rtsig pa bzhin no zhes 'dzer ro //
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa'i phyir rtsig pa bzhin no zhes 'dzer ro //
translated: Because it is not an utpala, like a wall.

original: skyes bu ni sems pa mngon par gsal ba'i khyad par can gyi lus yin gyi /
analyzed: skyes bu ni sems pa mngon par gsal ba'i khyad par can gyi lus yin gyi /
translated: The person is a body that is a special manifestation of consciousness.

original: gzhan bdag la sogs pa 'dzin rten pha rol dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan bdag la sogs pa 'dzin rten pha rol dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not the other self and so on that possess the other world.

original: der yang mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir to //
analyzed: der yang mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir to //
translated: Because it is not the object of direct perception.

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin pas gtan tshigs brjod do @150a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin pas gtan tshigs brjod do @150a * //
translated: Since inference itself is the proof, the reason is stated.

original: zhe'o ; / bsam pa ni skyes bu de lta bu ni mdzub tshugs su sgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhe'o ; / bsam pa ni skyes bu de lta bu ni mdzub tshugs su sgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: The idea is that such a person cannot be established by direct perception,

original: dpe la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the example is not established.

original: des na spyir gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can du bsgrub pas yin te /
analyzed: des na spyir gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can du bsgrub pas yin te /
translated: Therefore, in general, it is established as having a second [term] by anything at all,

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni thabs yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni thabs yin no //
translated: because the means of establishing the probandum is the method.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: 'di la spyi'am khyad par gang //
analyzed: 'di la spyi'am khyad par gang //
translated: In this case, whether it is a general or specific probandum,

original: bsgrub par bya ba de nyid de //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba de nyid de //
translated: that itself is the probandum.

original: brjod 'dod nyid ni bsgrub bya zhes //
analyzed: brjod 'dod nyid ni bsgrub bya zhes //
translated: The desire to express is the probandum.

original: 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin //
translated: This is a single, definite [rule].

original: zhes bya ba'i 'gel gyi don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'gel gyi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: 'di ltar sgras zin pa ni skyes bu nyid yin pas de la ltos nas rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro zhes rigs pa snga ma nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgras zin pa ni skyes bu nyid yin pas de la ltos nas rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro zhes rigs pa snga ma nyid do //
translated: Thus, since the literal [meaning] is personhood, in dependence on that, there would be no pervasion. This is the previous reasoning itself.

original: 'on te 'ba' zhig grub pa yin mod kyi //
analyzed: 'on te 'ba' zhig grub pa yin mod kyi //
translated: But if it is established as only that,

original: de sgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de sgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not to be established.

original: de'i tshe yang ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to //
translated: We have already shown that this would lead to absurd consequences.

original: 'dir khyad par phangs ba med pa la ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par phangs ba med pa la ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that the particular is not like that?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: gang gi phyir lus ma grub na gsal ba med pa'i phyir spyi ga la yod /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus ma grub na gsal ba med pa'i phyir spyi ga la yod /
translated: For if the particular is not established, how can the universal exist, since there is no manifestation?

original: ba lang gi gsal ba med par ni spyi srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang gi gsal ba med par ni spyi srid pa ma yin no //
translated: The universal does not exist without the manifestation of the particular.

original: gsal ba zhig kyang spyi'i mi 'jig ste rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba zhig kyang spyi'i mi 'jig ste rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And even if the particular does exist, the universal does not cease to exist, because it is permanent.

original: gsal bar byed pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
translated: It is not an object of conventional activity because it does not manifest.

original: gsal ba yod na spyi de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba yod na spyi de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If the particular exists, the universal would be like that.

original: ma yin te 'dir srid pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te 'dir srid pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is not possible.

original: de lta bu'i skyes bu ni tshad ma gzhan gyis srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i skyes bu ni tshad ma gzhan gyis srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Such a person is not possible according to any other valid means of knowledge.

original: ji ltar gsal ba med na spyi yod tha snyad kyi yul ma yin pa de bzhin du gang yang rung ba'i spyi yang yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar gsal ba med na spyi yod tha snyad kyi yul ma yin pa de bzhin du gang yang rung ba'i spyi yang yin no //
translated: Just as the universal does not exist without the particular and is not an object of conventional activity, so too any universal is not possible.

original: tshad ma'i 'di nyid las grub po zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'di nyid las grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is established by the authority of the scriptures,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: phan tshun rten pa'i nyes pas thal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩrjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma yod na spyi yod la //
analyzed: phan tshun rten pa'i nyes pas thal ba'i phyir ro // rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma yod na spyi yod la //
translated: because of the fault of mutual dependence.üîΩIf there is the authority of inference, there is the universal;

original: spyi yod na rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spyi yod na rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: if there is the universal, there is inference.

original: spyi yod ma grub pa la ni rnam pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi yod ma grub pa la ni rnam pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But if the universal is not established, the form is not.

original: des na ji ltar gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ma yin pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya yang ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ji ltar gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba gtan tshigs ma yin pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as ‚Äúany‚Äù is not a reason, so also the probandum is not.

original: 'di ltar phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus, in the case of ‚Äúbecause of any in the similar instance,‚Äù

original: phyogs nyid la sgra yod kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gnyis gang yang rung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs nyid la sgra yod kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gnyis gang yang rung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: the sound is in the position itself, not in any of the two, the position and the similar instance.

original: sgra la 'gal ba med pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sgra la 'gal ba med pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is no contradiction in sound,

original: gang yang rung ba'i sgra ni rnam par rtag pa yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i sgra ni rnam par rtag pa yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word ‚Äúany‚Äù has a universal as its referent.

original: nges pa'i chos srid na ni gzhan 'god pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i chos srid na ni gzhan 'god pa ma yin no //
translated: If there were a definite topic, then it would not be stated otherwise.

original: gzhan nye bar bkod pa med par ni gang yang rung ba'i sgra 'jug pa mi @150b srid do ;
analyzed: gzhan nye bar bkod pa med par ni gang yang rung ba'i sgra 'jug pa mi @150b srid do ;
translated: Without the statement of another, it is impossible for any word to be used.

original: / de'i phyir 'di ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: / de'i phyir 'di ni mi rung ste /
translated: Therefore, this is not correct.

original: gzhan yang gal te 'dir de lta bu'i skyes bu nyid sgrub pa ma yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te 'dir de lta bu'i skyes bu nyid sgrub pa ma yin na de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if in this way a person is not established, then at that time,

original: snam bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can yin no zhes bya ba nyid rjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: snam bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa can yin no zhes bya ba nyid rjod par 'gyur te /
translated: it would be stated that either a cloth or a pot is the second.

original: ci'i phyir gnyi gar bum pa nyid smos //
analyzed: ci'i phyir gnyi gar bum pa nyid smos //
translated: Why is a pot stated as the second?

original: de la sgrub par byed par smra ba'i bsam pas ni 'di yin te ;
analyzed: de la sgrub par byed par smra ba'i bsam pas ni 'di yin te ;
translated: In this regard, the intention of the proponent of the proof is this:

original: gal te snam bu chos can blangs nas bum pa gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te snam bu chos can blangs nas bum pa gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a cloth is taken as the subject, then because a pot is the second, it would be an establishment of what is already established.

original: spyir gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: spyir gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: This very fault also applies to the general statement of being the second.

original: de mi 'phen na sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu ci yin te /
analyzed: de mi 'phen na sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu ci yin te /
translated: If that is not projected, then what is the result of the proof?

original: yang na ni mi 'dod par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: yang na ni mi 'dod par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Or else, it would not be asserted.

original: / de'i phyir gnyi gar bum pa'i rigs bstan pa ni shugs kyis skyes bu nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: / de'i phyir gnyi gar bum pa'i rigs bstan pa ni shugs kyis skyes bu nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don du yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that the universal of pot is taught as both is to be interpreted as meaning that the universal of pot itself is taught as being both.

original: de ltar na yang 'dir skyes bu nyid nges par brjod par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir gang yang rung ba smos pa ni don med do //
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'dir skyes bu nyid nges par brjod par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir gang yang rung ba smos pa ni don med do //
translated: But even so, since here the universal of person is definitely intended to be expressed, it is meaningless to mention either.

original: des na 'di ni ma mo gsham yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin du rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni ma mo gsham yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin du rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, like the statement ‚ÄúThis is the barren woman,‚Äù it contradicts its own words.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / shugs kyis nges par 'thob 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'di ltar / shugs kyis nges par 'thob 'gyur zhing //
translated: It is obtained by implication,

original: gang rung brjod pas rnam brtag yin //
analyzed: gang rung brjod pas rnam brtag yin //
translated: but it is imagined by mentioning either.

original: nges pa dang ni rnam par brtag / gnyi gcig la 'gyur bar dka' //
analyzed: nges pa dang ni rnam par brtag / gnyi gcig la 'gyur bar dka' //
translated: It is difficult for both ascertainment and imagination to occur in one.

original: gnyi gar bum pa nye bar bkod pas ni bum pa'i rigs rang nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par 'gal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyi gar bum pa nye bar bkod pas ni bum pa'i rigs rang nyid kyis gnyis pa dang bcas par 'gal ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the universal of pot is stated as both, it is contradictory for the universal of pot itself to be both.

original: shugs kyis skyes bu nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: shugs kyis skyes bu nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If the person is to be established by implication,

original: ci ltar de las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa gang yang rung brjod /
analyzed: ci ltar de las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa gang yang rung brjod /
translated: then how could it be established by the opposite of that?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: gang yang rung ba brjod pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'i don du yin te /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba brjod pa ni rjes su 'gro ba'i don du yin te /

original: rtsig pa las skyes bu rjes su 'gro ba ni med do zhe na /
analyzed: rtsig pa las skyes bu rjes su 'gro ba ni med do zhe na /
translated: but there is no extension of the person from the wall.

original: ci ltar gzhan rjes su 'gro bas skyes bu gzhan grub /
analyzed: ci ltar gzhan rjes su 'gro bas skyes bu gzhan grub /

original: shugs kyis so zhe na /
analyzed: shugs kyis so zhe na /

original: shugs de gang yin /
analyzed: shugs de gang yin /
translated: What is that implication?

original: ci gtan tshigs kyi 'am de ste tshig gi yin /
analyzed: ci gtan tshigs kyi 'am de ste tshig gi yin /

original: re zhig gtan tshigs kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig gtan tshigs kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not of the reason,

original: autpala ma yin pa skyes bus gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: autpala ma yin pa skyes bus gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te ma nges pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di ltar bum pa ni 'jig rten pha rol dang ldan pa skyes bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis dang bcas pa yin te zhes kyang sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar bum pa ni 'jig rten pha rol dang ldan pa skyes bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis dang bcas pa yin te zhes kyang sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the world beyond is related to the person, and either the pot or the person possesses a second, because it is established in that way.

original: brjod par 'dod gzhan du gyur na gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa la rag mod ce na /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod gzhan du gyur na gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa la rag mod ce na /

original: ma yin te /üîΩbrjod par @151a * //
analyzed: ma yin te / brjod par @151a * //

analyzed: 'dod pa la ltos pa'i sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'on te tshig gi shugs kyis yin no zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ni ngo tsha pa'i lta ba yin te /

original: tshig gi shugs kyis ni don 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig gi shugs kyis ni don 'grub pa ma yin te /

original: der ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not related to that.üîΩFor example,üîΩif someone says,

analyzed: 'di ltar / tshon po nyin par mi za zhes // de skad brjod par gyur pa na //

analyzed: log par brjod pa'ang srid phyir ro //

translated: If it is ascertained by a valid cognition that such a person exists in another place, then at that time the meaning of the other words, which are applied by the one who wishes to express that, would be inferred by the one who has the root of the valid cognition.

original: rang gis mthong ba ston pa ni /
analyzed: rang gis mthong ba ston pa ni /

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di la lan /
analyzed: 'di la lan /
translated: The response to that is as follows.

original: sgra dang bum pa'i khyad par gyi //
analyzed: sgra dang bum pa'i khyad par gyi //

original: rtog na 'jig pa'ang mtshungs she na //
analyzed: rtog na 'jig pa'ang mtshungs she na //

original: ma yin 'jig pa grub pa yis //
analyzed: ma yin 'jig pa grub pa yis //
translated: No, because the establishment of destruction

analyzed: sgra ni de ldan sgrub phyir ro //
translated: proves that sound possesses that.

original: de bzhin don gzhan yod na ni //
analyzed: de bzhin don gzhan yod na ni //
translated: In the same way, if something else exists,

original: bum pa'ang de dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: bum pa'ang de dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: then a pot would also possess that.

original: ci ltar ngag gi shugs kyis thob pa'i skyes bu ma grub pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ngag gi shugs kyis thob pa'i skyes bu ma grub pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ma grub po zhe na /

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba nyid de bzhin du byas pa yang ngo zhes bya ba yang ngo //

analyzed: snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i ngo bo mi rtag pa nyid ni bum pa la grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Impermanence, the nature of remaining in the middle between prior nonexistence and subsequent nonexistence, is established in a pot.

analyzed: gal te grub kyang de ni gzhan nyid yin pa des na ji ltar sgra mi rtag par 'gyur te /

analyzed: mi rtag pa de nyid ni sgra la yod pa ma yin no //

original: de ltar yin na skyes bu yang //
analyzed: de ltar yin na skyes bu yang //

original: grub la brten phyir lan don med //
analyzed: grub la brten phyir lan don med //

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /

original: gzhan nyid yin pas 'dra ba yin //
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin pas 'dra ba yin //

original: de lta min na de ci ltar //
analyzed: de lta min na de ci ltar //

original: gcig la 'dra ba yod min te //
analyzed: gcig la 'dra ba yod min te //
translated: similar in one?

original: zla bo la ni ltos phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ni ci 'dra ba bum pa la yin pa de 'dra ba nyid sgra la yang yin te /
analyzed: zla bo la ni ltos phyir ro // 'di ltar snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i mi rtag pa nyid ni ci 'dra ba bum pa la yin pa de 'dra ba nyid sgra la yang yin te /
