original: snga nas med pa la sogs pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga nas med pa la sogs pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, impermanence, which is characterized by nonexistence prior to and subsequent to arising, is similar in sound as it is in a pot, because nonexistence prior to and subsequent to arising is possible.

original: sgra brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba la ni rtsod pa med do //
analyzed: sgra brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba la ni rtsod pa med do //
translated: There is no dispute that sound is destroyed immediately after it is uttered.

original: de bzhin du gal te chos can bum pa yang rtsig ba dang 'dra bas de dang ldan par 'gyur pa yin na 'di sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te chos can bum pa yang rtsig ba dang 'dra bas de dang ldan par 'gyur pa yin na 'di sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Likewise, if the subject, the pot, were like the wall, then it would be related to the wall.

original: chos can bum pa dang rtsig pa dag ni skyes bu gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can bum pa dang rtsig pa dag ni skyes bu gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: But the subject, the pot, is not similar to the wall in having a second.

original: gal te 'dir yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi tshig tu smos kyang mthar gtugs pa'i don ni sgra la gnas pa'i khyad par nyid yin la /
analyzed: gal te 'dir yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi tshig tu smos kyang mthar gtugs pa'i don ni sgra la gnas pa'i khyad par nyid yin la /
translated: Even if the general property of impermanence is mentioned in the statement, the meaning that is finally reached is the particular that resides in the word.

original: des kyang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ci ltar de 'grub ce na /
analyzed: des kyang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ci ltar de 'grub ce na /
translated: And since that is not universal, how can it be established?

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: mi rtag sgra yi khyad par can //
analyzed: mi rtag sgra yi khyad par can //
translated: The particular of sound, impermanent,

original: rjes 'gro med nam 'brel pa //üîΩbzlog phyir ma yin mi ldan dang // gzhan ldan rnam gcod dam pa gnyis //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med nam 'brel pa // bzlog phyir ma yin mi ldan dang // gzhan ldan rnam gcod dam pa gnyis //
translated: is not universal, but related.

original: mi ldan gcod phyir gzhan dang ni //
analyzed: mi ldan gcod phyir gzhan dang ni //
translated: The two best negations are the negation of non-possession and the negation of possession by another.üîΩBecause of the negation of non-possession, it is not the case that

original: rjes 'gro med par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: there is no relation with another.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid khyad par can rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa de lta na yang rjes su 'gro bas khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid khyad par can rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa de lta na yang rjes su 'gro bas khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If impermanence is not a qualifier because it does not pervade, then it would be a qualifier because it pervades.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni tshogs pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni tshogs pa yin te /
translated: The object to be established is the collection,

original: de gal te sngar grub na sgrub par byed pa'i don ci yin de'i phyir 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro bas na /
analyzed: de gal te sngar grub na sgrub par byed pa'i don ci yin de'i phyir 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro bas na /
translated: and if that is established prior to the proof, then what is the point of the proof? Therefore, because of the mere pervasion,

original: mi rtag pa sgra la grub pas spyi nyid dang khyad par can nyid kyi bdag nyid du gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa sgra la grub pas spyi nyid dang khyad par can nyid kyi bdag nyid du gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: impermanence is established in sound, and it is made clear that it is a universal and a qualifier.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro bas khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar 'grub /
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro bas khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar 'grub /
translated: If impermanence is established as a qualifier by mere pervasion, how is it established?

original: gzhan dang rjes su 'gro bas gzhan sgrub na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dang rjes su 'gro bas gzhan sgrub na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is established by pervasion of another, then there is the fault of overextension.

original: de lta na ni gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba dang / dpe bsgrub par bya bas stod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni gtan tshigs thams cad 'gal ba dang / dpe bsgrub par bya bas stod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, all reasons would be contradictory, and the example would be established by the probandum.

original: smras ba'i chos rjes su 'gro ba med na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: smras ba'i chos rjes su 'gro ba med na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the stated property does not pervade, this fault would occur.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not so.

original: ma yin te bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in the probandum.

original: skyon med na ni 'ga' yang 'dod pa la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te ma 'brel pa rnam par @152a * //
analyzed: skyon med na ni 'ga' yang 'dod pa la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te ma 'brel pa rnam par @152a * //
translated: If there were no fault, then no one would be harmed by the desire, and so all desires would be fulfilled.

original: gcod pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcod pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the difference is made by the exclusion of the non-related.

original: ma 'byel ba dang gzhan dang 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas mi khyad par rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: ma 'byel ba dang gzhan dang 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas mi khyad par rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The difference is twofold: by the exclusion of the unrelated and by the exclusion of the related to something else.

original: sgra nyid mi rtag go zhes de ltar ni byed pa ma yin te 'on kyang sgra yang ste mi rtag pa nyid du 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid mi rtag go zhes de ltar ni byed pa ma yin te 'on kyang sgra yang ste mi rtag pa nyid du 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not like that, saying sound itself is impermanent, but rather sound is also, because of similarity in impermanence.

original: skyes bu sgrub pa la ni de ltar srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu sgrub pa la ni de ltar srid pa ma yin te /
translated: In the proof of a person, it is not possible in that way.

original: bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ni rtsig pa dang bum pa dag la mtshungs par ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid ni rtsig pa dang bum pa dag la mtshungs par ma yin no //
translated: The possession of a second by a pot is not the same in a wall and a pot.

original: gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid mtshungs so zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid mtshungs so zhe na /
translated: But if it is the same for any of them, then it is the same for both.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not the same.

original: des kyang rnal ma la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des kyang rnal ma la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the same for the other.

original: gal te nges pa med na ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te nges pa med na ni gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If there is no certainty, then it is the same for any of them, because it is the same for both.

original: 'dir ni nges pa nyid de /üîΩrtsig pa ni bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir ni nges pa nyid de / rtsig pa ni bum pas gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: But here there is certainty.üîΩThe wall is the same for the pot,üîΩbut the pot is not the same for the wall.

original: bum pa ni de ltar skyes pus gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o //üîΩgal te so sor nges pa la gang yang rung ba'i tshig sbyor ba nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: bum pa ni de ltar skyes pus gnyis pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsam pa'o // gal te so sor nges pa la gang yang rung ba'i tshig sbyor ba nyid ma yin nam /
translated: This is the opponent‚Äôs opinion.üîΩIf there is certainty, then it is not the same for any of them.

original: de ci ltar nges pa la gang yang rung ba nyid med na /
analyzed: de ci ltar nges pa la gang yang rung ba nyid med na /
translated: If it is not the same for any of them, then how can there be certainty?

original: des na rnam par brtag pa dang so sor nges pa dag 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par brtag pa dang so sor nges pa dag 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction between the analysis and the certainty.

original: 'di ltar lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin dag las gang yang rung ba la zan byin cig ces bya ba ni nges pa gcig la zan sbyin pa nyid rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin dag las gang yang rung ba la zan byin cig ces bya ba ni nges pa gcig la zan sbyin pa nyid rnam par gnas so //
translated: For example, in the sentence ‚ÄúGive food to either Devadatta or Yaj√±adatta,‚Äù the giving of food to one of them is established.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang skyes bu gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang skyes bu gnyis pa dang bcas pa nyid du nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: In the same way, here the presence of a second person is established.

original: 'dir tshig gis nges pa thob pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir tshig gis nges pa thob pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But this is not established by the words.

original: bya rog dang ta la'i tshul du nges par grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bya rog dang ta la'i tshul du nges par grub pa'i phyir /
translated: It is established by implication, like the crow and the palm tree.

original: de yang mngon sum gyis dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang mngon sum gyis dmigs pa yin no //
translated: And that is perceived by direct perception.

original: 'dir ni skyes bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas par brjod pa la skyes bu la nges pa mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni skyes bu dang bum pa gang yang rung bas gnyis pa dang bcas par brjod pa la skyes bu la nges pa mngon sum gyis grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, whether it is a person or a pot that is said to have a second, the presence of a second person is not established by direct perception.

original: za ba ni dngos po'i shugs kyis gcig la nges pa yin gyi tshig gi shugs kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: za ba ni dngos po'i shugs kyis gcig la nges pa yin gyi tshig gi shugs kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: The eating is established by the force of the thing, not by the force of the words,

original: za ba po'am ster ba po bskul ba rang gi 'dod pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: za ba po'am ster ba po bskul ba rang gi 'dod pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eater or giver is engaged by his own desire.

original: gal te 'di brjod kyang zan mi ster ram mi zan ni nges par gnas pa ma yin no //üîΩ'dir yang sgrub par byed pa'i shugs kyis nges par rtogs so zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'di brjod kyang zan mi ster ram mi zan ni nges par gnas pa ma yin no // 'dir yang sgrub par byed pa'i shugs kyis nges par rtogs so zhe na ma yin te /
translated: But if it is stated, it is not certain that the food will not be given or that the person will not eat.üîΩAnd here, it is ascertained by the force of the proof.üîΩBut that is not so, because it is possible in the opposite case as well.

original: bzlog pa la yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: bzlog pa la yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
translated: This shows that:

original: 'dis ni / khyad bar la ni rjes 'gro med //
analyzed: 'dis ni / khyad bar la ni rjes 'gro med //
translated: There is no pervasion in a particular.

original: spyi ni grub pa sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: spyi ni grub pa sgrub pa yin //
translated: A universal is a proof of what is already established.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi grub pa na ni glog la sogs pa 'ba' zhig la grub pa'i phyir @152b grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi grub pa na ni glog la sogs pa 'ba' zhig la grub pa'i phyir @152b grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If the universal of impermanence is established, then it is a proof of what is already established, because it is established in lightning and so on alone.

original: 'on te sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa yin na de'i tshe de bum pa la med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba de yang bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on te sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa yin na de'i tshe de bum pa la med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba de yang bsal ba yin te /
translated: But if it is impermanence qualified by sound, then at that time it does not exist in a pot, so there is no pervasion. That is also refuted.

original: gang gi phyir spyi nyid sgra la ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //üîΩde bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi nyid sgra la ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no // de bshad pa ni /
translated: Because the universal itself is not established in sound, it is what is to be established.üîΩThat is explained:

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: That is explained:

original: de spyi bsgrub par bya min pas //
analyzed: de spyi bsgrub par bya min pas //
translated: Because that universal is not to be established.

original: grub ba grub pa nyid ma yin //
analyzed: grub ba grub pa nyid ma yin //
translated: It is not the case that what is established is established.

original: chos can khyad par can de ni //
analyzed: chos can khyad par can de ni //
translated: That qualified property-possessor

original: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon ldan min //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon ldan min //
translated: is not faulty in lacking pervasion.

original: gal te gzhi la mi ltos pa'i mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni grub pa la bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhi la mi ltos pa'i mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni grub pa la bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If impermanence that does not rely on a basis were the probandum, then it would be the establishment of what is already established.

original: sgra la spyi sgrub pa yin pa des na grub pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra la spyi sgrub pa yin pa des na grub pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: Since sound is established by the general, it is not the establishment of what is already established.

original: gal te sgra la sgrub pa dang / spyi zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te sgra la sgrub pa dang / spyi zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin te /
translated: If sound is established and is called a general property, that is contradictory.

original: sgra'i spyi khyad par can nyid khyad par yin no //üîΩgal te spyi yin na ci ltar khyad par yin /
analyzed: sgra'i spyi khyad par can nyid khyad par yin no // gal te spyi yin na ci ltar khyad par yin /
translated: The general property of sound, which is qualified, is a qualifier.üîΩIf it is a general property, how can it be a qualifier?

original: khyad par yin no zhe na ni ci ltar spyi yin zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par yin no zhe na ni ci ltar spyi yin zhe na /
translated: If it is a qualifier, how can it be a general property?

original: de ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: spyi yis rjes 'gro grub na ni //üîΩde la 'brel pa bzung las gzhan //
analyzed: spyi yis rjes 'gro grub na ni // de la 'brel pa bzung las gzhan //
translated: If the establishment of the general property is established,üîΩthen it is only the final limit of the qualifier,

original: khyad par gyi ni mthar thug nyid //
analyzed: khyad par gyi ni mthar thug nyid //
translated: other than apprehending the connection to that.

original: phyogs chos dang ni ldan las yin //
analyzed: phyogs chos dang ni ldan las yin //
translated: It is from possessing the property of the subject.

original: sgra'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pas sgra'i khyad par can nyid du grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pas sgra'i khyad par can nyid du grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not established that the word is qualified by the word ‚Äúonly,‚Äù because the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not seen to follow the word ‚Äúfire.‚Äù

original: 'ba' zhig gis rjes su 'gro ba mthong bas de'i khyad par can nyid grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gis rjes su 'gro ba mthong bas de'i khyad par can nyid grub pa yin te /
translated: It is established that the word ‚Äúfire‚Äù is qualified by the word ‚Äúonly,‚Äù because the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is seen to follow the word ‚Äúfire.‚Äù

original: de nyid do zhes 'dra bas gcig nyid du brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid do zhes 'dra bas gcig nyid du brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is intended to express the identity of the two, because it is similar in that it says ‚Äúthat itself.‚Äù

original: gzhan la ston par byed pas ni du ba med na ni mi 'byung ba bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ston par byed pas ni du ba med na ni mi 'byung ba bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to teach that the presence of smoke is invariably concomitant with the presence of fire.

original: de ltar mes khyab par grub pa ni gang la nye bar de nyid du me'i blo skyed par byed de 'brel pa de bzhin du bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar mes khyab par grub pa ni gang la nye bar de nyid du me'i blo skyed par byed de 'brel pa de bzhin du bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, when it is established that fire pervades a place, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù produces the cognition of fire in that very place, because it is grasped as related to that place in the same way.

original: yul gang na yod pa'i me ni yul de nyid du skyed par byed do //
analyzed: yul gang na yod pa'i me ni yul de nyid du skyed par byed do //
translated: The fire that exists in a certain place produces the cognition of fire in that very place.

original: yul gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu bas 'brel pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu bas 'brel pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that the fire moves from one place to another.

original: gal te spyir rtogs na ci ltar khyad par rtogs she na /
analyzed: gal te spyir rtogs na ci ltar khyad par rtogs she na /
translated: If the cognition is of the universal, how can it be of the particular?

original: spyi ni khyad par med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: spyi ni khyad par med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because the universal does not occur without the particular.

original: des na rtogs pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in the realization.

original: yul dang dus dang gnas skabs so sor nges par ma rtogs par ni tha snyad gang yang mi 'grub po //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang gnas skabs so sor nges par ma rtogs par ni tha snyad gang yang mi 'grub po //
translated: Without realizing the object, time, and situation to be specific, no convention is established.

original: 'di ni tshad ma dpyad par sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir yang ma bzlas so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma dpyad par sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir yang ma bzlas so //
translated: Since this has already been explained in the analysis of valid cognition, I will not repeat it.

original: de'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par can gyi spyi sgrub pa'i phyir grub pa sgrub pa ma yin la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par can gyi spyi sgrub pa'i phyir grub pa sgrub pa ma yin la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yang med do //
translated: Therefore, because it establishes a universal that is a specific property of the subject, it is not an establishment of what is already established, and there is also no fault of non-pervasion.

original: gal te bsgrub bya dang lhan cig spyi rtogs par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya dang lhan cig spyi rtogs par bya ba yin la /
translated: If the universal is to be realized together with the probandum,

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang rjes su dpag pas shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang rjes su dpag pas shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: and the probandum is also indirectly realized by inference,

original: phyi'i khyab pa @153a * //
analyzed: phyi'i khyab pa @153a * //
translated: then the external pervasion

original: tsam gyis ni 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tsam gyis ni 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: is not established by mere pervasion,

original: phyogs ma yin pa'i byas pa thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes de ltar khyad par ston pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs ma yin pa'i byas pa thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes de ltar khyad par ston pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is not taught that way, that all produced things that are not the subject are impermanent.

original: des na nang gi khyab pa mi 'grub po //
analyzed: des na nang gi khyab pa mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, the internal pervasion is not established.

original: phyi'i khyab pa yin na ni der bsgrub bya grub ba mi skye'o //
analyzed: phyi'i khyab pa yin na ni der bsgrub bya grub ba mi skye'o //
translated: If the pervasion is external, then the probandum is not produced there.

original: gzhan khyab pas gal te gzhan 'grub na ni thams cad kyis thams cad 'grub par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan khyab pas gal te gzhan 'grub na ni thams cad kyis thams cad 'grub par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the pervasion is of another, and if another is produced, then it follows that everything would produce everything.

original: de yang gyi na ste /
analyzed: de yang gyi na ste /
translated: That is not a fault.

original: 'di ltar / 'di ni bshad zin gang gi phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di ni bshad zin gang gi phyir //
translated: Because it has already been explained,

original: chos can bcas par khyab rtogs te //
analyzed: chos can bcas par khyab rtogs te //
translated: the pervasion is understood together with the subject.

original: gang gang 'di 'drar gyur ba'i phyogs //
analyzed: gang gang 'di 'drar gyur ba'i phyogs //
translated: Whatever is like this,

original: de ni bsgrub bya med mi 'byung //üîΩphyogs 'di ni med dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni bsgrub bya med mi 'byung // phyogs 'di ni med dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: that does not occur without the probandum.üîΩThis subject has the property of being possessed by smoke, because it is possessed by smoke, like a kitchen.

original: du ba dang ldan pa'i phyir tshang bang bzhin no zhes de lta bur rtogs pa'i shugs kyis sngar nyid bzung ngo zhes brjod do //
analyzed: du ba dang ldan pa'i phyir tshang bang bzhin no zhes de lta bur rtogs pa'i shugs kyis sngar nyid bzung ngo zhes brjod do //
translated: In that way, it is said that the prior apprehension is by the force of understanding in that way.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: If that is not so,

original: bsgrub bya yang rang gi ngo bo nyid bzung ni rjes su dpag pas ci bya /
analyzed: bsgrub bya yang rang gi ngo bo nyid bzung ni rjes su dpag pas ci bya /
translated: then what is the use of inference, if the probandum is apprehended by its own nature?

original: sngar gyi du ba rtogs pa nyid du ba 'di yang mer rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sngar gyi du ba rtogs pa nyid du ba 'di yang mer rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: The prior apprehension of smoke is the apprehension of this smoke as fire.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba med par ni rtogs par nus pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba med par ni rtogs par nus pa ma yin no ;
translated: But it is not possible to realize it as existent.

original: / des de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yod pa nyid kyis rtogs so zhes tha snyad tsam du brjod do //
analyzed: / des de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yod pa nyid kyis rtogs so zhes tha snyad tsam du brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is said conventionally that the nature of that is realized by the existence of the realization.

original: tha snyad tsam gyis bzung ba yin na /
analyzed: tha snyad tsam gyis bzung ba yin na /
translated: If it is apprehended by mere convention,

original: don dam par ma bzung ba'i phyir ci ltar mi slu ba yin zhe na /üîΩde lta bu'i don bya ba byed pa nyid la der 'dzin pa'i phyir mi slu ba yin no /
analyzed: don dam par ma bzung ba'i phyir ci ltar mi slu ba yin zhe na / de lta bu'i don bya ba byed pa nyid la der 'dzin pa'i phyir mi slu ba yin no /
translated: how is it nondeceptive, since it is not apprehended ultimately?

original: // / bam po gsum pa /
analyzed: // / bam po gsum pa /
translated: It is nondeceptive because it apprehends that object in terms of the performance of its function.

original: nges pa 'di ci zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa 'di ci zhe na /
translated: What is this certainty?

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the relation of cause and effect is certain.

original: nges pa de nyid ci ltar 'dzin zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa de nyid ci ltar 'dzin zhe na /
translated: How is that certainty apprehended?

original: tha snyad 'di nyid las so //
analyzed: tha snyad 'di nyid las so //
translated: From this very convention.

original: 'brel pa la sogs pa thams cad ni thog ma med pa'i tha snyad las shes pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'brel pa la sogs pa thams cad ni thog ma med pa'i tha snyad las shes pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has been demonstrated that all relations, etc., are known from beginningless convention, not ultimately.

original: de'i phyir spyi 'brel pa bzung na khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi 'brel pa bzung na khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, when a universal is apprehended, a particular is realized.

original: de ni khyad par med par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni khyad par med par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference between them.

original: tha snyad thams cad de lta bu nyid do //üîΩ'dis ni chos can chos dag gis //
analyzed: tha snyad thams cad de lta bu nyid do // 'dis ni chos can chos dag gis //
translated: All conventions are just like that.üîΩBy this, the subject and the attributes

original: chos dang chos can khyad par can //
analyzed: chos dang chos can khyad par can //
translated: are distinguished in the thesis.

original: 'gog pa dag ni gsal yin te //
analyzed: 'gog pa dag ni gsal yin te //
translated: The refutation is clear,

original: chos can de ltar mi 'grub phyir //
analyzed: chos can de ltar mi 'grub phyir //
translated: because the subject is not established in that way.

original: sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes dam bcas pa na /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa'o zhes dam bcas pa na /
translated: When one asserts, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent,‚Äù

original: gal te sgra mi rtag par bsgrub pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgra mi rtag par bsgrub pa yin na /
translated: if one is proving that sound is impermanent,

original: sgra la sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: sgra la sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa'am /
translated: then either the impermanence qualified by sound or

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par can gyi sgra 'grub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par can gyi sgra 'grub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: sound qualified by impermanence would be established.

original: des na de las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: des na de las bzlog pa sgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, because the opposite of that is established, there is a contradiction.

original: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'di sgra la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa de bzhin du sgra'i khyad par @153b can gyi mi rtag pa nyid med pa yang yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes smras pa de yang 'dod pa bsgrub byar brjod pa 'dis gsal ba yin
analyzed: ji ltar gtan tshigs 'di sgra la mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa de bzhin du sgra'i khyad par @153b can gyi mi rtag pa nyid med pa yang yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes smras pa de yang 'dod pa bsgrub byar brjod pa 'dis gsal ba yin
translated: This is also clear from the statement that the thesis is to be proven.

original: no // sgra la mi rtag pa'i sgra bsgrub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: no // sgra la mi rtag pa'i sgra bsgrub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that sound is proven to be impermanent,

original: ma rtag pa nyid tsam zhig bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtag pa nyid tsam zhig bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is merely impermanence that is proven.

original: mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub na ci ltar spyi sgrub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa tsam bsgrub na ci ltar spyi sgrub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If mere impermanence is proven, how is a universal proven?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de lta bu nyid du spyi sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du spyi sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a universal is proven in just that way.

original: chos can dang lhan cig tshogs pa sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can dang lhan cig tshogs pa sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the collection of the subject together with the property is proven.

original: chos can sgra la mi rtag pa dang / sgra'i spyi gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can sgra la mi rtag pa dang / sgra'i spyi gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Sound as the subject is not proven to be impermanent or to be another universal of sound that is to be proven.

original: des na de bzlog kyang nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de bzlog kyang nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if that is refuted, there is no fault.

original: mi rtag pa tsam bzlog na ni skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa tsam bzlog na ni skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: But if mere impermanence is refuted, there would be a fault.

original: ji ltar 'dus pa'i phyin ci log tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus pa'i phyin ci log tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does the collection become the opposite?

original: gnyis las gcig med na spyi bzlog par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis las gcig med na spyi bzlog par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if one of the two is not present, the collection is reversed.

original: gcig lus na ni tshogs pa srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig lus na ni tshogs pa srid pa ma yin no //
translated: If one remains, the collection is not possible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos can la chos 'ba' zhig nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos can la chos 'ba' zhig nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, only the property itself is to be established in regard to the subject.

original: de lta bu nyid 'dus pa sgrub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid 'dus pa sgrub pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is just that which is to be established in the collection.

original: gcig la gnyis pa sgrub pa na tshogs par 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig la gnyis pa sgrub pa na tshogs par 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because when one is established in the other, the collection is established.

original: 'o na ci ltar chos dang chos can dang / de tshogs pa dang khyad par bzlog pa tha dad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar chos dang chos can dang / de tshogs pa dang khyad par bzlog pa tha dad ce na /
translated: Well, then, how are the property, the subject, and the collection of those different from the reversal?

original: de'i sgo nas bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, the reversal is from that.

original: de'i sgro nas tshogs pa bzlog pa ni des tha snyad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgro nas tshogs pa bzlog pa ni des tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: Because of that, the reversal of the collection is the expression of that.

original: don dam par ni tshogs pa gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: don dam par ni tshogs pa gsal ba nyid do //
translated: But in reality, the collection is just the manifestation.

original: sgra ni mi rtag pa'i sgra 'am sgra'i mi rtag pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dus pa gsal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag pa'i sgra 'am sgra'i mi rtag pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dus pa gsal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: The sound is either the sound of impermanence or it is the collection of the sound and impermanence.

original: de ltar ni dam bcas pa ma yin te mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni dam bcas pa ma yin te mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not the case, because it is impossible.

original: sgra mi rtag go zhes dam bcas pas ni chos can gzhan la spyis grub pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag go zhes dam bcas pas ni chos can gzhan la spyis grub pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: By the thesis ‚ÄúSound is impermanent,‚Äù the establishment of the subject by the reason is not understood.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du tshogs pa sgrub mi srid pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du tshogs pa sgrub mi srid pa'i phyir ;
translated: Therefore, because it is impossible to establish the collection in another way,

original: chos can la sogs pa 'ba' zhig bsal pa nyid kyis tshogs pa bsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: chos can la sogs pa 'ba' zhig bsal pa nyid kyis tshogs pa bsal ba yin gyi /
translated: the collection is eliminated just by the elimination of the subject, etc.

original: sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyis sgra bsal bas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyis sgra bsal bas ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that sound is eliminated by impermanence.

original: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not accepted that the probandum is like that.

original: mi 'dod pa bsal ba ni skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa bsal ba ni skyon ma yin no //
translated: The elimination of what is not accepted is not a fault.

original: chos can la ni tshogs pa dag / bsal ba 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can la ni tshogs pa dag / bsal ba 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: The collection in the subject is not eliminated by the contradiction.

original: gang phyir de ltar bsgrub 'dod min //
analyzed: gang phyir de ltar bsgrub 'dod min //
translated: Because it is not accepted that the probandum is like that.

original: 'dir chos 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya yin //
analyzed: 'dir chos 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya yin //
translated: Here, only the property is the probandum.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the summary.

original: gal te 'dod pa smos pa bsgrub byar mi 'dod pa bzlog kyang nyes pa med par bstan pa lhur gnyer ba yin na /üîΩde la ci ltar chos can la sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid bkag @154a * //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa smos pa bsgrub byar mi 'dod pa bzlog kyang nyes pa med par bstan pa lhur gnyer ba yin na / de la ci ltar chos can la sgra'i khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid bkag @154a * //
translated: If you are intent on showing that there is no fault in refuting what is not intended to be established, even though you mention what is intended,üîΩthen just as there is no fault in refuting impermanence qualified by sound as the subject,

original: pa la skyon med pa de bzhin du nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid bkag kyang skyon med pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: pa la skyon med pa de bzhin du nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa nyid bkag kyang skyon med pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: in the same way, there is no fault in refuting impermanence qualified by the property of space.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true,

original: de lta na yang rang nyid smos ba ni log par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir yin no //üîΩ'di ltar / chos can gcig la bstan bcos las ;
analyzed: de lta na yang rang nyid smos ba ni log par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir yin no // 'di ltar / chos can gcig la bstan bcos las ;
translated: but even so, mentioning oneself is for the purpose of refuting misconceptions.üîΩThus, in one subject,

original: / chos rnams du ma rnam gzhag kyang //
analyzed: / chos rnams du ma rnam gzhag kyang //
translated: many properties are presented in the treatise.

original: bdag nyid 'dod pa bsgrub bya zhes //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'dod pa bsgrub bya zhes //
translated: But the one intended by oneself is to be established.

original: bdag nyid kyis ni sgra smos so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni sgra smos so //
translated: Therefore, one should mention oneself.

original: kha cig na re bstan bcos la mthong ba ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: kha cig na re bstan bcos la mthong ba ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: Some say that what is seen in the treatise is what is to be established.

original: de la gnod pas ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag gi skyon du 'gyur zhe'o //
analyzed: de la gnod pas ni gtan tshigs dang dam bca' ba dag gi skyon du 'gyur zhe'o //
translated: The fault of the thesis and the reason would be to contradict it.

original: de ltar yang rigs pa'i bshad pa las /
analyzed: de ltar yang rigs pa'i bshad pa las /
translated: Thus, the Rational System of Exposition says:

original: dam bca' ba ni lung yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba ni lung yin te /
translated: The thesis is scripture.

original: lung gi don ston pa'i phyir lung zhes brjod de gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lung gi don ston pa'i phyir lung zhes brjod de gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it teaches the meaning of scripture, it is called scripture, but not otherwise.

original: rnam 'grel las /
analyzed: rnam 'grel las /
translated: The Thorough Exposition of Valid Cognition says:

original: gzhan du ni lung tshad ma yin pa'i phyir dang dam bca' ba ni the tshom sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ci ltar gcig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan du ni lung tshad ma yin pa'i phyir dang dam bca' ba ni the tshom sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ci ltar gcig tu 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, because scripture is valid cognition, and because the thesis proves doubt, how could it be one?

original: de nyid ni lung gi don gzhan la ston pas na /
analyzed: de nyid ni lung gi don gzhan la ston pas na /
translated: Because it teaches the meaning of scripture to others,

original: lung gi don yin no //
analyzed: lung gi don yin no //
translated: it is the meaning of scripture.

original: de'i phyir dam bca' ba ni lung yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dam bca' ba ni lung yin te /
translated: Therefore, the thesis is scripture.

original: de'i don la gnod na gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin te /
analyzed: de'i don la gnod na gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin te /
translated: If its meaning is contradicted, it is a fault of the reason,

original: bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contradicts the treatise.

original: bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: A reason that contradicts the treatise does not prove the probandum.

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin no //
translated: It is also a fault of the thesis.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang don gcig la 'du ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang don gcig la 'du ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: Impermanence is the same as the quality of space, and it is the thesis to be established.

original: ci ltar bstan bcos sa ma gtan tshigs gzhan 'ga' zhig gis de la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ltar /
analyzed: ci ltar bstan bcos sa ma gtan tshigs gzhan 'ga' zhig gis de la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba ltar /
translated: Just as in the treatise, the quality of space is established by some other reason,

original: dam bca' ba'i don ni de lta bu'i mi rtag ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don ni de lta bu'i mi rtag ba nyid yin no //
translated: the meaning of the thesis is impermanence in that way.

original: de yang des bsal bas dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: de yang des bsal bas dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no //
translated: And that is the fault of the thesis, because it is refuted by that.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / skad cig de ma thag 'jig na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / skad cig de ma thag 'jig na //
translated: If it is destroyed immediately after the moment,

original: nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid brdzun //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid brdzun //
translated: it is false to have the nature of the quality of space.

original: dus gzhan dag tu 'jig na yang //
analyzed: dus gzhan dag tu 'jig na yang //
translated: If it is destroyed at other times,

original: nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid brdzun //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid brdzun //
translated: it is false to have the nature of the quality of space.

original: gal te sgra'i bdag nyid de rgyu med pa'i phyir skad cig gi mod la 'jig na ji ltar nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i bdag nyid de rgyu med pa'i phyir skad cig gi mod la 'jig na ji ltar nam mkha'i yon tan bdag nyid du 'gyur /
translated: If that which has the nature of sound is destroyed immediately after the moment because it is without cause, how could it have the nature of the quality of space?

original: rten zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rgyu yin na skad cig ma ni gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rten zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rgyu yin na skad cig ma ni gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The so-called basis is the cause of endurance, but the moment is not endurance.

original: skad cig gcig ni rang gi rgyu nyid las yin no //
analyzed: skad cig gcig ni rang gi rgyu nyid las yin no //
translated: One moment is due to its own cause.

original: 'on te dus gzhan du gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te dus gzhan du gnas pa yin na /
translated: If it endures for another moment,

original: de ni rang gi rgyu las skyes pa yin pas /
analyzed: de ni rang gi rgyu las skyes pa yin pas /
translated: it is due to its own cause.

original: de'i tshe yang rgyu'i @154b dbang gis gnas pa yin pa'i phyir rten gyis ci bya /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rgyu'i @154b dbang gis gnas pa yin pa'i phyir rten gyis ci bya /
translated: So what is the point of a support, since it endures by the power of its cause?

original: 'on na de rten gyi dbang gis dus gzhan dug gzhan du gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on na de rten gyi dbang gis dus gzhan dug gzhan du gnas pa yin na /
translated: If it endures for another moment by the power of a support,

original: mi 'jig pa nyid kyis gnas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi 'jig pa nyid kyis gnas pa ma yin nam /
translated: then it endures because it does not disintegrate.üîΩWhat is the point of a support? Sound is not heavy, and space does not have the nature of supporting anything.üîΩSpace does not support anything heavy.üîΩThe heavy does not have the nature of supporting.üîΩThe heavy does not have the nature of supporting.

analyzed: rten gyis ci bya gang gi rten med na lhung bar 'gyur ba sgra ni lci ba nyid kyang ma yin la nam mkha' yang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin la brten pa ma yin no //
