analyzed: dus la ltos par 'gyur bas na //
translated: would depend on time.üîΩSince they would mutually depend,

original: phan tshun rten pas gcig nyid dang // gnas pa med par 'gyur ba yin//
analyzed: phan tshun rten pas gcig nyid dang // gnas pa med par 'gyur ba yin//
translated: there would be no singularity and no endurance.

original: gal te cig car 'das pa nyid //
analyzed: gal te cig car 'das pa nyid //
translated: If the past exists simultaneously,

original: yin na thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: yin na thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: there would be an infinite regress.

original: cig car 'byung ba gnyis dag ni //
analyzed: cig car 'byung ba gnyis dag ni //
translated: Simultaneously occurring things

original: phan tshun dang ni rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: phan tshun dang ni rgyu ma yin //
translated: are not mutually causes.

original: gal te de dag gzhan las ni //
analyzed: gal te de dag gzhan las ni //
translated: If they are different from each other,

original: de la'ang gzhan phyir thug med 'gyur //
analyzed: de la'ang gzhan phyir thug med 'gyur //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: gzhan yang gal te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te /
translated: Moreover, if

original: sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan yin la /
analyzed: sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan yin la /
translated: Sound is a quality of space.

original: rlung gi yon tan reg / me'i yon tan gzugs /
analyzed: rlung gi yon tan reg / me'i yon tan gzugs /
translated: Touch is a quality of wind. Form is a quality of fire.

original: chu'i yon tan ro //
analyzed: chu'i yon tan ro //
translated: Taste is a quality of water.

original: sa'i yon tan dri yin la /
analyzed: sa'i yon tan dri yin la /
translated: Smell is a quality of earth.

original: dus kyi yon tan gang yin par brjod par bya /üîΩbdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dus kyi yon tan gang yin par brjod par bya / bdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: What is the quality of time?üîΩWhat is the quality of self?

original: 'on te dus kyi yon tan chen po nyid la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te dus kyi yon tan chen po nyid la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Or, are the qualities of time, greatness, etc.

original: de ni bdag la sogs pa'i yang yin no //üîΩdes na bdag nyid kyi so sor nges ba @166a * //
analyzed: de ni bdag la sogs pa'i yang yin no // des na bdag nyid kyi so sor nges ba @166a * //
translated: the qualities of self, etc.?

original: 'ga' zhig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the specific nature of each must be stated.

original: 'on te don rnams gnang pa dang 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don rnams gnang pa dang 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the meaning of the word ‚Äúquality‚Äù is to allow or to prohibit,

original: de dag ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i dbang nyid las yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i dbang nyid las yin no //
translated: then that is due to the power of the cause of concomitance and nonconcomitance.

original: de yang rang gi rgyu las yin pa'i phyir rgyu brgyud pa thog ma med pa nyid yin no //üîΩgzhan yang / gal te khyab dang rtag pa yis //
analyzed: de yang rang gi rgyu las yin pa'i phyir rgyu brgyud pa thog ma med pa nyid yin no // gzhan yang / gal te khyab dang rtag pa yis //
translated: And that is due to its own cause, so there is an infinite regress of causes.üîΩMoreover,üîΩIf you can allow or prohibit

original: gnang dang bkag par nus na ni //
analyzed: gnang dang bkag par nus na ni //
translated: through pervasiveness and permanence,

original: bdag kyang de ltar mthong 'gyur te //
analyzed: bdag kyang de ltar mthong 'gyur te //
translated: I too will see it in that way,

original: khyad par gzhan ni 'dod med phyir //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan ni 'dod med phyir //
translated: because I do not assert any other difference.

original: 'di ltar dus dang yul dang bdag dang nam mkha' zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rtag pa nyid la sogs par mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dus dang yul dang bdag dang nam mkha' zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rtag pa nyid la sogs par mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, time, space, self, and the so-called ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa are the same in being permanent, and so on.üîΩTherefore:

original: des na / yul dang dus ni mtshungs gyur pa ;
analyzed: des na / yul dang dus ni mtshungs gyur pa ;
translated: Because they are similar with respect to time and space,

original: / bya ba dang ni mi ldan phyir //
analyzed: / bya ba dang ni mi ldan phyir //
translated: they are not endowed with activity.

original: 'dis byas 'dir ni ma nges zhes //
analyzed: 'dis byas 'dir ni ma nges zhes //
translated: ‚Äú This is produced by that‚Äù is not ascertained.üîΩHow can it be known that it is not non-dharma?

original: chos min mthun pa ci ltar rig / de'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs par smra ba ni ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos min mthun pa ci ltar rig / de'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs par smra ba ni ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore it is not tenable to propound that ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa and so on are qualities of the self.üîΩTherefore:

original: des na / smra ba nam mkha'i yon tan ni //
analyzed: des na / smra ba nam mkha'i yon tan ni //
translated: The propounding of ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa as a quality of the self

original: chad mas 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chad mas 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: is not tenable.

original: gzhan yang / sgra ni nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung ba yin na 'di rlung gi yon tan nyid du cis mi brjod /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sgra ni nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung ba yin na 'di rlung gi yon tan nyid du cis mi brjod /
translated: Moreover, if sound arises from ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa and air, why is it not stated that it is a quality of air?

original: 'di ni nam mkha' nyid du thos pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha' nyid du thos pa yin te /
translated: It is heard as ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa itself.

original: des na 'di ni nam mkha'i nyid yon tan nyid du rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'di ni nam mkha'i nyid yon tan nyid du rtogs so zhe na /
translated: Therefore it is understood that it is a quality of ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa itself.

original: 'bar sogs nam mkhar mthong min na //
analyzed: 'bar sogs nam mkhar mthong min na //
translated: If you say that sound is not seen in space,

original: ce na de de'i yon tan du mi brjod //üîΩde rten gzhan yang yod ces 'thad min te ;
analyzed: ce na de de'i yon tan du mi brjod // de rten gzhan yang yod ces 'thad min te ;
translated: then you should not say that it is a quality of space.üîΩIt is not tenable to say that there is another basis for sound,

original: / sgra la'ang rnga sogs gzhan dag yod pa nyid //
analyzed: / sgra la'ang rnga sogs gzhan dag yod pa nyid //
translated: and that sound exists in the drum and so on.

original: gal te gang zhig gang du gnas par dmigs pa de de'i yon tan yin na /
analyzed: gal te gang zhig gang du gnas par dmigs pa de de'i yon tan yin na /
translated: If that which is perceived to exist in something is a quality of that thing,

original: 'bang ba la sogs pa yang ci ste nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin /
analyzed: 'bang ba la sogs pa yang ci ste nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin /
translated: then why is sound not a quality of space?

original: de la ni rtsig pa dang shing la sogs pa rten gzhan yod pa'i phyir der gnas par rtogs pas nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la ni rtsig pa dang shing la sogs pa rten gzhan yod pa'i phyir der gnas par rtogs pas nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin no zhe na /
translated: You may say that sound is not a quality of space because it is perceived to exist in other things, such as walls and trees.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: gnyi ga la gnas pas gnyi ga'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //üîΩsgra la yang pa ta ha dang dung la sogs pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga la gnas pas gnyi ga'i yon tan du 'gyur ro // sgra la yang pa ta ha dang dung la sogs pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Sound is a quality of both space and those things, because it is perceived to exist in both.üîΩSound exists in the drum and in the conch.

original: yul gzhan du thos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: yul gzhan du thos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: You may say that sound is not a quality of the drum and so on, because it is heard in other places.

original: 'di ni snang ba la sogs pa dag la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni snang ba la sogs pa dag la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same for light and so on.

original: de la ni nor bu la sogs pa rten na yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na sgra yang brdungs pa'i rdzas yod pas de mtshungs so //
analyzed: de la ni nor bu la sogs pa rten na yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na sgra yang brdungs pa'i rdzas yod pas de mtshungs so //
translated: But sound is similar to that, since the substance that is struck exists.

original: de'i phyir sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, sound is not a quality of space.

original: der gnas par dmigs kyang der gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: der gnas par dmigs kyang der gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is perceived as abiding there, it does not abide there,

original: snang ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: snang ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like light, etc.

original: nam mkha' ni gnas par byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni gnas par byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Space is not even the abode of sound,

original: thogs @166b pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thogs @166b pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not impeded.

original: nam mkha' ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Space is immaterial, invisible, and unimpeded.

original: snang ba yod na nam mkha' shes pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba yod na nam mkha' shes pa yin te /
translated: Space is known when there is light,

original: gang du snang pa nyid yod pa der nam mkha' btags pa'i phyir nam mkha' ni brtags par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du snang pa nyid yod pa der nam mkha' btags pa'i phyir nam mkha' ni brtags par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because space is designated where there is light. Therefore, space does not exist as a designation.

original: des na sgra nam mkha'i yon tan yin no zhes bya ba ni legs par brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra nam mkha'i yon tan yin no zhes bya ba ni legs par brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not well said that sound is a quality of space.

original: des na nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la gnod kyang skyon 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: des na nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la gnod kyang skyon 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, even though the quality of space is refuted, there is no fault.

original: gzhan yang / phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi //
translated: Moreover:üîΩThe definition of a thesis would be meaningless

original: rang nyid sgra yang don med 'gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid sgra yang don med 'gyur //
translated: For one who asserts external objects.

original: rang nyid kyi sgra ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur ba de bzlog pa don nyid de /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi sgra ni bstan bcos khas blangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur ba de bzlog pa don nyid de /
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is accepted in the treatise, so the assertion of the treatise author would be the thesis. That is to be refuted, because it is meaningless.

original: dgos pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: dgos pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no other purpose.

original: gal te de yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na ni /
translated: If that is also the thesis,

original: de don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be meaningless.

original: de lta na ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid don dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid don dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, the definition of a thesis would be meaningless because it would not be related to the purpose.

original: gal te bstan bcos 'dod 'jug don //
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos 'dod 'jug don //
translated: If the treatise is engaged for the sake of the purpose,

original: 'o na dogs 'di gang las yin //
analyzed: 'o na dogs 'di gang las yin //
translated: then from what is this doubt?

original: de ni tshad mas bkag med na //
analyzed: de ni tshad mas bkag med na //
translated: If it is not refuted by valid knowledge,

original: 'dzin pa gang gis bzlog par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dzin pa gang gis bzlog par 'gyur //
translated: by what apprehension will it be refuted?

original: gal te tshad mas bkag na yang //
analyzed: gal te tshad mas bkag na yang //
translated: If it is refuted by valid knowledge,

original: tshig las gang gis 'jug par 'gyur //üîΩde dag sngar yang grub mtha' ni //
analyzed: tshig las gang gis 'jug par 'gyur // de dag sngar yang grub mtha' ni //
translated: by what words will it be engaged?üîΩPreviously, they held their own philosophical tenet

original: rang gi 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dzin //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dzin //
translated: system through their own assertions.

original: de ni phyis kyang ci zhig ltar gzhan 'dzin pa ni cis mi 'thob //
analyzed: de ni phyis kyang ci zhig ltar gzhan 'dzin pa ni cis mi 'thob //
translated: And later on, why would one not obtain the same thing by apprehending something else?

original: gal te rtogs pa po rtog pa sngon du byed pa las yin na brtag pa de nyid de'i bstan bcos khas len pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa des na ci ltar bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug par byed pa'i phyir rang nyid smos /
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa po rtog pa sngon du byed pa las yin na brtag pa de nyid de'i bstan bcos khas len pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa des na ci ltar bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug par byed pa'i phyir rang nyid smos /
translated: If the one who understands does so on the basis of having previously conceived of something, then the very act of conceiving of something is the reason for accepting that treatise. Therefore, why would one engage in the treatise out of desire?

original: bstan bcos thams cad ni brtag bzod pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: bstan bcos thams cad ni brtag bzod pa ma yin te ;
translated: All treatises are not able to withstand analysis.

original: des na tshad mas gnod pa yongs su ma dag pa la 'jug pa ma yin pa nyid pas na 'dod pas 'jug pa gal srid /
analyzed: des na tshad mas gnod pa yongs su ma dag pa la 'jug pa ma yin pa nyid pas na 'dod pas 'jug pa gal srid /
translated: Therefore, since they are not engaged in by those who are completely pure and who are harmed by valid cognition, if one engages in them out of desire,

original: 'di ltar / rtog pa sngon byas byed pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rtog pa sngon byas byed pa ni //
translated: then in that case,

original: 'dod pa tsam las 'jug ma yin //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam las 'jug ma yin //
translated: the act of conceiving of something is not engaged in out of mere desire.

original: rnam par dpyod byed skyes bu ni //
analyzed: rnam par dpyod byed skyes bu ni //
translated: The person who engages in analysis

original: blo bzang gis ni dang po'i rten /
analyzed: blo bzang gis ni dang po'i rten /
translated: has a good intellect and relies on the first.

original: gal te rtogs ldan min na ni //
analyzed: gal te rtogs ldan min na ni //
translated: If he is not endowed with understanding,

original: 'dod nyid de yi rgyu mtshan te //
analyzed: 'dod nyid de yi rgyu mtshan te //
translated: then desire itself is the reason.üîΩThe first of those

original: de yi dang po khas len pa //
analyzed: de yi dang po khas len pa //
translated: is accepted.

original: de tsam gyis ni zhugs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni zhugs pa'i phyir //
translated: One engages in it to that extent.

original: des ni gnyis pa gsum pa yang //
analyzed: des ni gnyis pa gsum pa yang //
translated: The second and third are also

original: de bzhin du ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: likewise.

original: de dag de don du slob na //
analyzed: de dag de don du slob na //
translated: If they are taught for that purpose,

original: mi 'dod par ni bsab bya yin /
analyzed: mi 'dod par ni bsab bya yin /
translated: then it is to be refuted.

original: gal te snga ma bzhon 'di yang khyod kyi 'dod pa @167a * //üîΩnyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir bstan bcos 'dod pas bzung pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di nyid smos pas bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te snga ma bzhon 'di yang khyod kyi 'dod pa @167a * // nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir bstan bcos 'dod pas bzung pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di nyid smos pas bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If you say that this is also like the former,üîΩthen since you yourself accept the thesis, it is to be established by the treatise.

original: de'i tshe brtags nas khas blang par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe brtags nas khas blang par bya ba yin te /
translated: If you say that, then it is to be accepted after analysis.üîΩHere it is not the case that mere assertion is relevant.

original: 'dir 'dod pa tsam ni skabs su 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes 'dod pas 'jug pa dang 'gal ba'i rigs pa bstan par rigs pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'dir 'dod pa tsam ni skabs su 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes 'dod pas 'jug pa dang 'gal ba'i rigs pa bstan par rigs pa yin no ;
translated: Therefore it is reasonable to teach reasoning that contradicts your assertion.

original: / des na gal te bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub bya yin na /
analyzed: / des na gal te bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub bya yin na /
translated: If seeing is to be established by the treatise,

original: rang nyid smos pa mi rigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang nyid smos pa mi rigs pa nyid do //
translated: then it is unreasonable for you to state it yourself.

original: de ltar na 'o na bstan bcos kyi don spangs nas rnag nyid 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pa la yang /
analyzed: de ltar na 'o na bstan bcos kyi don spangs nas rnag nyid 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pa la yang /
translated: If that is so, then having abandoned the meaning of the treatise, it is to be established by the treatise that you assert pus.

original: gal te tshad mas gnod na de las su yang mi 'gyur 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te tshad mas gnod na de las su yang mi 'gyur 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: If it is invalidated by a valid cognition, then it is not a means of valid cognition for anyone.

original: gal te mi gnod do zhen yang rang nyid 'jug pas na rang nyid smos pas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mi gnod do zhen yang rang nyid 'jug pas na rang nyid smos pas ci bya zhe na /
translated: If it is not invalidated, then since it engages by itself, what is the use of mentioning itself?üîΩThe answer is:

original: lan du / 'dod gnod med dang bsgrub bya min //
analyzed: lan du / 'dod gnod med dang bsgrub bya min //
translated: It is not invalidated by what is desired, nor is it to be established.

original: thug pa med par bstan pas na //
analyzed: thug pa med par bstan pas na //
translated: Because of the demonstration of non-repetition,

original: log par rtogs pa bsal pa'i phyir //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa bsal pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to dispel wrong understanding,

original: 'dir ni rang nyid sgra byas so //
analyzed: 'dir ni rang nyid sgra byas so //
translated: here itself is mentioned.

original: bstan bcos thams cad ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos thams cad ni log par rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir yin te /
translated: All treatises are for the purpose of dispelling wrong understanding.

original: des na 'dir yang bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes log par rtogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir yang bstan bcos las mthong ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes log par rtogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here also, in the treatise, it is not that seeing is to be established, because there is no wrong understanding.

original: rnam pa gang gis she na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis she na /
translated: By what aspect?

original: 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin pa dang / thug pa med par bstan pas so //
analyzed: 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin pa dang / thug pa med par bstan pas so //
translated: By not being invalidated by what is desired, by not being to be established, and by demonstrating non-repetition.

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba ni gnod kyang 'dod pa la gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba ni gnod kyang 'dod pa la gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the treatise, seeing is not invalidated even though it is desired.

original: med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya ma yin la /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya ma yin la /
translated: And if it is not a non-pervasion, it is not the thesis.üîΩIf it is a non-pervasion, but the thesis, then there would be an infinite regress.

original: med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa yin yang de bsgrub bya yin na ni thug pa med par thal ba zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'i ni rang nyid smos pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa yin yang de bsgrub bya yin na ni thug pa med par thal ba zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'i ni rang nyid smos pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the reasoning called ‚Äúthe consequence of an infinite regress.‚Äù

original: des na 'di ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not the case.

original: gzhung lugs kyis byas khyad par ni //
analyzed: gzhung lugs kyis byas khyad par ni //
translated: The Particular That Is Created By The SystemüîΩHaving Abandoned The Well-Known

original: yongs su spangs nas rab grags pa'i //
analyzed: yongs su spangs nas rab grags pa'i //
translated: Subject,

original: chos can dag ni gzung don du //
analyzed: chos can dag ni gzung don du //
translated: The Meaning Of The Proposition Is Taken To Be The Subject.

original: gzhan ni rang nyid sgra brjod zer //
analyzed: gzhan ni rang nyid sgra brjod zer //
translated: The Other Says That It Is Itself The Expression Of The Word.

original: gzhung gis bkod pa'i khyad par nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi chos can gang yin pa de yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: gzhung gis bkod pa'i khyad par nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi chos can gang yin pa de yongs su spangs nas /
translated: Having abandoned the subject that is characterized by the particular that is posited by the system, such as the quality of space,

original: rang nyid rab tu grub pa bstan bcos byed pas bsgrub pa ma yin pa'i chos can gang yin pa de spyi nas bzung ba'i phyir rang nyid smos pa yin te 'di ltar chos can gang zhig rang nyid rnam par gnas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rang nyid rab tu grub pa bstan bcos byed pas bsgrub pa ma yin pa'i chos can gang yin pa de spyi nas bzung ba'i phyir rang nyid smos pa yin te 'di ltar chos can gang zhig rang nyid rnam par gnas pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the subject is that which is established by itself,

original: gzhan gyis byas pa ni ma yin pa de /üîΩchos can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di shugs kyis bstan pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis byas pa ni ma yin pa de / chos can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di shugs kyis bstan pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
translated: not that which is established by another.üîΩThis is indirectly demonstrated by the statement, ‚ÄúThe subject is that which is established by itself, not that which is established by another.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar / dpyad pa nyid kyi skabs kyis na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dpyad pa nyid kyi skabs kyis na //
translated: This is not so, becauseüîΩthe basis of the well-known

original: rab grags rten ni grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: rab grags rten ni grub 'gyur te //
translated: is established by the context of the analysis.

original: rab 'dod @167b brtags pa'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: rab 'dod @167b brtags pa'i khyad par ni //
translated: The special object of investigation

original: dngos rnams la rtsod med phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos rnams la rtsod med phyir ro //
translated: is not disputed with regard to things.

original: chos can 'ga' zhig la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid la sogs par dpyod pa byed pa ni grub pa'i rang bzhin la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can 'ga' zhig la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid la sogs par dpyod pa byed pa ni grub pa'i rang bzhin la byed pa yin no //
translated: The analysis of permanence, impermanence, and so on is performed with regard to some subject that is established by itself.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de la ni re zhig de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin te //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de la ni re zhig de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin te //
translated: The nature of that which is to be established is to be analyzed first.

original: chos can ma grub pa na sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa na sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For if the subject is not established, the proof is impossible.

original: 'on te sgra'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sgra'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if the nature of sound is to be established,

original: 'o na ni de nyid chos can gyi rang bzhin du blang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni de nyid chos can gyi rang bzhin du blang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: then that very [sound] is to be taken as the nature of the subject.

original: ma grub pa'i khyad par blangs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i khyad par blangs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of taking a nonexistent distinction?

original: 'on te rgol ba de lta bu nyid mi rtag par sgrub par 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rgol ba de lta bu nyid mi rtag par sgrub par 'dod do zhe na /
translated: But if you assert that very sound to be impermanent,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: 'di ltar / nyan po der 'dod med phyir te//
analyzed: 'di ltar / nyan po der 'dod med phyir te//
translated: Because the hearer does not desire that,

original: de las de 'grub min pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de las de 'grub min pa'i phyir //
translated: and because that is not established from that.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan dang ldan pa //üîΩbsgrub byar brjod pa'i don med min //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan dang ldan pa // bsgrub byar brjod pa'i don med min //
translated: The quality of spaceüîΩis not meaningless when stated as the probandum.

original: rtog pa sngon du byed pa dag gi tshig ni don med par 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du byed pa dag gi tshig ni don med par 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: The words of those who proceed with concepts are not meaningless.

original: re zhig phyir rgol ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa sgrub par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig phyir rgol ba ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid kyi khyad par can gyi mi rtag pa sgrub par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: For the time being, the opponent does not want to prove that sound is impermanent, which is qualified by the property of being a quality of space.

original: mi 'dod pa nyid dam bca' ba tsam gyis grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa nyid dam bca' ba tsam gyis grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it established by the mere thesis that he does not want to prove that.

original: de lta ma yin na nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin pa'i sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar yang 'grub par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin pa'i sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar yang 'grub par 'gyur la /
translated: If it were not so, then it would be established that sound, which is not a quality of space, is impermanent because it is produced,

original: ci ltar 'dod pa'i don gzhan yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar 'dod pa'i don gzhan yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and it would also establish a different object than what is wanted.

original: 'on te rgol ba de lta bu nyid du 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rgol ba de lta bu nyid du 'dod do zhe na /
translated: But if one accepts that the opponent is just like that,

original: de lta yin na de lta bu dpyod pa dang bral ba 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa sus zlog ste /
analyzed: de lta yin na de lta bu dpyod pa dang bral ba 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa sus zlog ste /
translated: then who could stop the engagement of mere assertion without analysis of that kind?

original: des na 'di ni ma yin no //üîΩci ste grub par bstan pa yis //
analyzed: des na 'di ni ma yin no // ci ste grub par bstan pa yis //
translated: Therefore, this is not so.üîΩBut if it is taught that it is established,

original: chos can bsgrub bya min brjod na //
analyzed: chos can bsgrub bya min brjod na //
translated: and the subject is not expressed as the probandum,üîΩthen this very statement

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is taught to have its own nature‚ÄùüîΩwould understand that.

original: zhes bya 'di nyid kyis de rtogs //üîΩ'di ltar / grub dang sgrub pa'i ngo bor ni //
analyzed: zhes bya 'di nyid kyis de rtogs //üîΩ'di ltar / grub dang sgrub pa'i ngo bor ni //
translated: Thus,

original: bstan pa dag ni yod min na //
analyzed: bstan pa dag ni yod min na //
translated: If the subject does not exist,

original: bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa zhes //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa zhes //
translated: then the statement ‚ÄúIt is taught to be the object to be established‚Äù

original: bya ba 'di ni 'bras ldan 'gyur //üîΩci ste 'di skad 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: bya ba 'di ni 'bras ldan 'gyur // ci ste 'di skad 'chad par byed de /
translated: would be meaningless.üîΩBut if you say, ‚ÄúIt is taught to be the object to be established because it is itself established,‚Äù

original: rang nyid grub par 'gyur ba nyid yin no zhes brjod pas na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang nyid grub par 'gyur ba nyid yin no zhes brjod pas na chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: then the nature of the subject is not the object to be established.

original: de lta ma yin na de rang nyid smos pas khyad par du byas pas don gyi rigs ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de rang nyid smos pas khyad par du byas pas don gyi rigs ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, if it were the object to be established, then what would be the point of stating it, since it would be specified by itself?

original: 'di ltar re zhig chos can 'grub par bstan pa tsam gyi phyir ni smos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig chos can 'grub par bstan pa tsam gyi phyir ni smos pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, it is not stated merely to teach that the subject is established.

original: dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i skabs nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is established by the context of the analysis itself.

original: de'i phyir rab tu grub pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab tu grub pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is well established,üîΩbut it is not the object to be established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bsgrub bya nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bsgrub bya nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir rang nyid smos pa yin te /
translated: In order to teach that it is not the object to be established, it is stated by itself.

original: des na chos can bsgrub bya ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na chos can bsgrub bya ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the subject is not the object to be established.

original: de yang @168a * //
analyzed: de yang @168a * //
translated: But that is not so.

original: mi 'thad de /
analyzed: mi 'thad de /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: 'di ltar / gang zhig grub kyang sgrub byed ba'i //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang zhig grub kyang sgrub byed ba'i //
translated: Thus,

original: rtogs ldan de ni 'ga' yod min //
analyzed: rtogs ldan de ni 'ga' yod min //
translated: There is no one who has understandingüîΩThat is established by a proof.

original: de tshe rtogs pa de nyid ni //
analyzed: de tshe rtogs pa de nyid ni //
translated: At that time, how could that understanding

original: ci ltar bsgrub byar rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub byar rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: Be understood as something to be proven?

original: de lta na ni 'o na rang gi ngo bo kho nas zhes smos pa don med pa nyid de dpyad pa'i skabs nyid kyis grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na rang gi ngo bo kho nas zhes smos pa don med pa nyid de dpyad pa'i skabs nyid kyis grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were like that, then the statement ‚Äúby its own nature‚Äù would be meaningless, because that which is established is not something to be proven, since it is established by the very occasion of the analysis.

original: grub pa ni rtsod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa ni rtsod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is established is not a topic of debate.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir //
translated: Because the reason is stated in regard to doubt,

original: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin //
analyzed: bsal ba gtan tshigs rten ma yin //
translated: The refutation is not the basis of the reason.

original: de bzhin du dpyod pa'i yang rten ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpyod pa'i yang rten ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is not the basis of the analysis.

original: grub pa yang de bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: grub pa yang de bzhin no zhe na /
translated: That which is established is not like that.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: In this regard, it is said:

original: rang gi ngo bo smos pa ni grub pa bzlog ba'i don du ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo smos pa ni grub pa bzlog ba'i don du ma yin te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúby its own nature‚Äù is not for the purpose of refuting establishment.

original: sgrub byed nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa'i bzlog pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa'i bzlog pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the purpose of refuting nonestablishment, which is taught to be the proof.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo kho nas zhes nges par bzung ba nyid du 'bras bu gcig tu bstan te de lta ma yin na gnyi ga so sor bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo kho nas zhes nges par bzung ba nyid du 'bras bu gcig tu bstan te de lta ma yin na gnyi ga so sor bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in ‚Äúonly by its own nature‚Äù teaches that the effect is one, because if it were not so, both would be taught separately.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir grub pa sgrub pa'i ngo bo dag ces bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir grub pa sgrub pa'i ngo bo dag ces bshad ce na /
translated: Why is it explained as ‚Äúthe nature of the establishment of what is established‚Äù?

original: ma grub pa chos can grub pa ngo bor ston pa dang / de bzhin du chos sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bor ston pa zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa chos can grub pa ngo bor ston pa dang / de bzhin du chos sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bor ston pa zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained as ‚Äúthe nature of the establishment of the established subject‚Äù and ‚Äúthe nature of the establishment of the property.‚Äù

original: chos can grub pa'i ngo bo bstan pa de yang 'ba' zhig par te /üîΩdper na / bdag ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu'o zhes sam de bzhin du /
analyzed: chos can grub pa'i ngo bo bstan pa de yang 'ba' zhig par te / dper na / bdag ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu'o zhes sam de bzhin du /
translated: The teaching of the nature of the establishment of the subject is not alone.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra ni mi rtag pa'o zhes chos can gyi khyad par nyid du ston pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra ni mi rtag pa'o zhes chos can gyi khyad par nyid du ston pa'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThe self is the cause of the possessor of the collection,‚Äù or similarly, ‚ÄúThe sound of the quality of space is impermanent.‚Äù It teaches the distinction of the subject.

original: yang na gang du chos can khyad par can du byas pa der /
analyzed: yang na gang du chos can khyad par can du byas pa der /
translated: Or, where the subject is made distinctive,

original: nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra mi rtag ste zhes brjod pa'i phyir na mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin no zhes ji ltar shes te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra mi rtag ste zhes brjod pa'i phyir na mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi nam mkha'i yon tan ma yin no zhes ji ltar shes te /
translated: Because the phrase ‚Äúthe sound that is the quality of space is impermanent‚Äù is stated, impermanence is the object to be established, but it is not the quality of space.üîΩHow do you know that?

original: sgra gang yin pa de nam mkha'i yon tan yin nam 'on te nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra gang yin pa de mi rtag pa yin par sgrub ces mi shes par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgra gang yin pa de nam mkha'i yon tan yin nam 'on te nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra gang yin pa de mi rtag pa yin par sgrub ces mi shes par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that you do not know whether the sound that is the quality of space is impermanent, then you do not know whether the sound that is the quality of space is impermanent.

original: sgra mtshungs kyang de yang skabs nyid las rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: sgra mtshungs kyang de yang skabs nyid las rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: Even though the words are the same, the meaning is understood from the context.

original: de ltar yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: de ltar yang bstan zin to //
translated: This is also taught in the following.

original: 'o na ci ltar sgra mnyan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba rang gi ngo bo smos pa'i rnam par gcad par bya bar bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar sgra mnyan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba rang gi ngo bo smos pa'i rnam par gcad par bya bar bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, how is it that the statement ‚ÄúSound is to be heard‚Äù is taught to be an exclusion that mentions its own nature?

original: des rnam par gzung ba'i don yin na ni de mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: des rnam par gzung ba'i don yin na ni de mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: If the meaning of that is apprehended by that, it is not tenable.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true.

original: de ltar na yang de la gzhan gyi phyir byas pa gzhan gyi don du yang 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir khas blangs nas de skad brjod de ci ste yang bsgrub byar byed pa de lta na yang rang gi ngo bo smos bzlog par @168b byed pa'i phyir skyon
analyzed: de ltar na yang de la gzhan gyi phyir byas pa gzhan gyi don du yang 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir khas blangs nas de skad brjod de ci ste yang bsgrub byar byed pa de lta na yang rang gi ngo bo smos bzlog par @168b byed pa'i phyir skyon
translated: Nevertheless, we accept that for the sake of others, it is called ‚Äúfor the sake of others,‚Äù and if you make it a probandum, there is no fault, because it is a mere repetition of its own nature.

original: med do // zlog pa ci ltar thob ce na /
analyzed: med do // zlog pa ci ltar thob ce na /
translated: How is it obtained in reverse?

original: de la rtsod pa mthong ba'i phyir de yang phyis bstan par bya'o //üîΩrjes su dpag pa spyi yi ni //
analyzed: de la rtsod pa mthong ba'i phyir de yang phyis bstan par bya'o // rjes su dpag pa spyi yi ni //
translated: Because we see the dispute there, that will be explained later.üîΩInference is explained

original: yul can nyid du bshad pa yin //
analyzed: yul can nyid du bshad pa yin //
translated: as having a universal as its object.
